The quad family room was a little small for our family of 4 adults but it did not bother us much because we spent most of our time outside the hotel. For the price that we paid, it was excellent value for money.
h_title_comment: Great Value for Money, Very Friendly and Helpful Staffs
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Only good things to say about our stay at Serene Palace. Our room was spacious and spotless. The food was absolutely incredible - so much so that we asked if we could meet the chef (young "Master Chef" by the way) after one of the best meals we had on our trip. All of the hotel staff were extremely friendly. Would highly recommend!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
I have nothing but great things to say about this hotel!
1) Excellent service - the most friendly staff we encountered during our trip in Vietnam. Very caring and thoughtful, but not in a way that it is clearly fake and for business purposes.
2) Great rooms! Spacious, comfy, all necessary amenities, speedy wifi, good bathroom.
3) AMAZING restaurant!!! Not only is it cheap, it's DELICIOUS and VERY authentic. Breakfast is from a menu but you can order UNLIMITED food + fruit / drinks buffet and it was honestly SO YUM.
4) Really good value, especially given its location.
All in all - highly recommend :)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Great money for value stay. I stayed here for a couple nights. They arrange transport to and from the airport for $15 each way which was very convenient. When you arrive they give you a map and nice orientation and advice.

The room was very big and clean. The breakfast was great. It isn't a buffet but they give you a menu of selections and you can choose as many as you want to eat.

The Citadel is only about a 15 minute walk from the hotel along the river. Not a far walk at all. Right in front of the hotel is a rental place for scooters. I got one for a day to go visit the tombs. All I can say is if you go visit the tombs on your own as I did make sure you have GPS or you will not find them. With GPS I managed to visit all the tombs to the south of the city.

Overall a great hotel. Nice, affordable and very nice hotel staff. I would return.
h_title_comment: Great Value for Money in Hue!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We had stayed at their sister hotel in Hanoi. Same quality of service. It was raining while we were there. Staff made sure we had umbrellas when we went out and called for a car when we needed one. We were staying for 2 nights. Mary helped us to plan our activities. Many restaunts and bars are nearby. Breakfast was great and the staff very friendly. Great place!
h_title_comment: Excellent service, friendly atmosphere, great food.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We had a superior room which was very comfortable. The hotel was very clean and the staffs were very nice, professional and helpful. The hotel is centrally located within easy walking distance of Huong river and main area. Breakfast is included and there were lots of choices. The wifi worked well. The price was very reasonable. We only stayed one night and would have liked to have stayed longer.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel a few nights ago. Staff were so friendly, we literally couldn't fault them.

The hotel is in a good location, everything is within a 10 min walk.

The restaurant is one of the best restaurants votes on trip advisor but we didn't realise this so didn't have dinner there. The breakfast was good, they offer a buffet and a menu included in the price.

The room itself was very spacious and super clean for Vietnamese standards. The bed was comfortable and there were lots of channels on the tv.

I would very much recommend this hotel as it is very good value and we had a great stay!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We found the staff at the hotel extremely friendly and helpful with good English. Our room was clean and comfortable and had everything needed in a hotel room. The restaurant food was very good,local cuisine and breakfast was a really good choice of freshly prepared food of your own choosing. The hotel location was fine..you could easily walk to the river and negotiate a river trip and the main town is right on the doorstep. The Imperial Palace was a longish walk but a very cheap taxi ride away.
We would use this hotel again if we ever return to Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great staff, all very friendly and efficient. Rooms as per our previous visit 2 years ago were spacious, modern and clean. Nothing is too much trouble and for the price charged this has to ge one of the best deals to get in Vietnam. I would not hesitate to come here again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
We were happy with the great service and clean accommodation. On our arrival, we were served fresh fruits and juice. The reception staff, Kelly, gave us maps and elaborated on the locations, entrance fees and transportation available.

They were understanding to our needs and we're prompt to accede to our requests. Kelly and other front line staff spoke good English and facilitated our communication.

The breakfast was sumptuous (ala carte buffet style) and we really enjoyed it. I'll definitely recommend this place to others.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
Although it absolutely poured rain while we were in Hue, the central location of the Serene Palace made it possible to walk to some key spots.

Rooms are large and modern, great value. Also really enjoyed the breakfast and the wifi was great. The staff are also very nice and able to help with requests.

Only thing really I will take a mark off for was the shower - there was a jacuzzi tub(small) but no overhead shower. Had to hold the extension manually. Not a huge issue, but could be remedied.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Hue Serene Palae was the best place we stayed at during our Vietnam trip. Super friendly staff - we got some fresh fruit juice and fresh cut fruit when we came in and they explained where everything was in the city. Very helpful in answering our questions. Even we checked in very early (about 8:30am), they still got a room ready for us in about 5 minutes. Also great breakfast, both western and Vietnamese. It was about a 25 min walk to the Imperial City, which wears ok for us, but may be a bit far for some. A few popular bars with tourists seem to be nearby.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We booked 3 nights here in a superior room. From the moment of arrival following a long overnight train journey from Hanoi, we were looked after and made to feel special. The staff gave us a really warm welcome, with a welcome drink and quick check in. We were given all the essential information about local places of interest, trips available and the costs involved. Our room was spotless and had all the amenities one would expect of a quality hotel. The food was great, with lots of choice. The reception staff even booked our onward train tickets to Nha Trang and Ho Chi Minh City for less than we had seen online. The hotel was well placed near the centre and a few minutes walk from the waterfront. We had a great time there and can certainly recommend this hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Stayed here for 2 days. The staff are very friendly, informative and helpful. The room was large, clean and comfortable.
Breakfast was satisfactory and a large range of choices.
Only downside would be that the drains in the bathroom were slow to drain but not to the point of overflow and hotwater only lasted about 5 minutes but as i was on my own it was not too much of an issue.
Would stay here again happily.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Great room, Great breakfast, great staff! The restaurant is lovely and all the staff are so friendly. We had no issues whilst staying here. Everything was clean and up to a great standard. We will come back here if even in Hue again. The location is a short walk from lots of restaurant and cafes, and the tour desk provides services for sightseeing all within a short distance away. Thanks for the memories.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: This hotel was well appointed, and in a good location to access many of Hue's attractions. It is within walking distance of the city and the citadel. Most of all the staff were friendly and incredibly helpful. Tours and other tickets are very easily booked through their service.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The hotel was booked for us as part of a Tour. Fantastic service from start to finish. Clean and comfortable rooms with a great restaurant for sampling local Vietnamese food. We would happily stay here again and recommend to others. Located in the heart of the restaurant area and not far from the Perfume River.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I really can't say Hue was my favorite place , but if I cone back I'll probably just stay at The Serene Palace and talk to all the sweet girls that work there . Si was the one that took care of me , she's a sweetheart and really wants you to have a great stay . There was also Kelly who was new there but I'm sure she'll be a great asset for them . Breakfast was great as it is at all the Serene Hotels . Rooms were clean a spacious with plenty of perks . Located close to plenty of food and drink ,
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
We stayed for three nights in this hotel and we loved it from the first moment. Even though we arrived very early at 9am they were able to get our room ready so that we could go there after a nice and delicious breakfast.
The room was big, clean, modern and quiet. The staff very nice and helpful.
The breakfast was a la carte and was delicous. You could order as much as you liked and they always tried to motivate you to get more, so you never felt bad.
We also booked a tour by the hotel and it was very good as well. The guide spoke perfect english and had a huge knowledge to share. We had some very beautiful days there.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Lets start with the amazing service, I stay in hotels all over the world and I have got to say that the service here was amazing, nothing to little was an issue, they were very attentive indeed. As we were late arriving we dined at the hotel, the food was a good quality and reasonably priced for the surrounding area.

The location was brilliant, 5 mins and you were in the centre of Hue, directly opposite Motovina bike hire, who we used for an epic tour through the jungle nd mountains.
h_title_comment: Superb service and excellent location make this a stand out hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This is so good that I have to comment here to let more people to visit here!
Thank you for your kindness , Sally
We would definitely recommend it to my friend .
Fried spring roll and pho are recommend.
Chocolate mousse is tasty ðŸ˜‹
h_title_comment: Good Breakfast and dinner , Nice people , comfortable room
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The staff is friendly and helpful. Our host Sophie was awesome and really made our trip to Hue great because of her tips and arrangements. The room was nice and comfortable and also breakfast was good.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: After theee weeks of backpacking I came to sleepy hue and decided to splurge on a private double ensure. Simply the best twenty dollars spent on the trip. Located right in the heart just a five min Walk to the mini restaurant pub strip and also within walking distance to the citadel. The staff are unbelievable and really go out of their way to assist. The breakfast was great with a huge choice range. Their restaurant was busy in the evening no doubt due to the TripAdvisor reviews, I didn't eat there myself however. The room was plenty big great shower hot water and complimentary food and water. I would defo recommend for couples or weary backpackers who are on a detox break!!! This place was the highlight of hue for me..
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: From the arrival until our leaving we only saw into friendly faces - from the door boys via all the helpful people in the receptionist to the service personal in the restaurant. They really take good care and can help you with everything. I really liked that with arrival Mary took her time to show us on a map what to see and the best ways to get there. Thanks again for that. The position is in a quite street not far from the center. We had a huge family room - new and clean - for a very reasonable price. Just book it and enjoy. // Sven
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Overnight train from Hanoi to Hue (pronounced Hway) and we arrived at the hotel all hot and stuff. Porters rushed straight over and grabbed our bags and the other staff gave us a cold flannel, a large plate of fresh fruit and fruit drinks - exactly what we needed and a very polite and unexpected gesture. Hospitality here was brilliant and the staff didn't hesitate as soon as they saw you - asking how your day was, opening doors. My stay here was the epitome of outstanding customer service. The rooms were modern and clean and we had a nice view from balcony. They helped us navigate the city and helped us book a private car to Hoi An which also gave a tour of sites on the way. You could book the private car for about $10USD cheaper elsewhere but I didn't mind them making a bit of commission given the service they provided. Would stay again. Thanks.
h_reviewer_address: Ashby de la Zouch, United Kingdom
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Had a good couple of nights here. The room was huge, the biggest we had in 2 weeks in Vietnam. Although the bathroom looked like it required some maintenance. The bath/shower seemed to leak around some broken tiles at the far end which caused water to pool on the floor and follow a channel down to a drain. It wasn't a massive issue to us but appears they've just made a work around rather than fix the issue properly. The breakfast at the restaurant downstairs was decent too. Staff were very helpful and organised scooter hire and transport to Hoi An at competitive prices too.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The staff at Serene palace were great. They helped me arrange an easy rider to Hoi An, gave me great tips on where to go around Hue, set me up with a local driver to see all of the historical sites, etc. The laundry device was reasonably priced and high quality as was the food. Definitely a good midrange stop for anyone traveling through Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Great location, extremely delightful staff, clean rooms, comfy beds. Serene Palace has everything you need at an excellent price for your stay in Hue. In particular, we loved how helpful the staff was. Highly recommend!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: This place is indeed a bit more serene than the standard hotel in Hue as it is on a smaller lane versus a busy road, though it can be a bit harder to find the first time. Otherwise, the service was great, the room was everything I was looking for (plus a desktop computer in the room), and the price was very competitive. Nothing to complain about.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We were able to walk around the main parts of Hue from this hotel, it's near a lot of restaurants and the rooms are pretty comfortable but nothing special. The staff were helpful and friendly, overall it was a good place to stay in Hue, and seemed quite good value.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We have travelled to many countries across the globe, this hotel is the best value for money we have ever had
The hotel organized a taxi from train station to the hotel
We were welcomed with free drink and fruit
The room was beautiful, clean and spacious. Overlooking the river. It's in a side street in busy popular area, no noise in the rooms!
All the staff were very friendly and helpful.
Breakfast was nice. Eggs, pancakes, fruit, juices etc
Complimentary water, tea, coffee and fruit in the room
You can book various tours at the hotel, and they help organizing transportation
Tiny minor thing was not so strong wifi connection in the room
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Nice place in good condition and definitely worth the price. I travel a lot, hence usually have a good feeling about what i want and what i can expect.Rooms were clean, service was good, location was convenient.

Best was the personal travel assistance from the front desk, namely from a very nice lady called Si.
h_title_comment: Great location, awesome service, fabulous hospitality
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: I was staying as solo traveller - very helpfull staff. Rooms are comfortable. This hotel owns in neighbourhood SPA centre (5 min from the hotel), here the massage means a massage with very good masters (clean, before and after - shower is available).
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: The service in this hotel is impeccable. We can't say enough. The room was clean, and everyone did all that they could do to make our stay comfortable. I am a stickler for customer service, and even I was impressed!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
This hotel is so cool, my best comfort in Vietnam. The reception when I arrived was so good, and my room was excellent with free wifi and a computer, a TV with some English movie channels as well as AC.

The restaurant was awesome, had both dinner and breakfast there. So good!

Mia, one of the ladies in the restaurant is a GEMðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜.....

Checked out early but they kept my bag, and even offered me a shower when I returned in the afternoon just before transferring to HD airport. Perfect for holidays!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
We booked this hotel for a one night stay following on from great reviews on TripAdvisor and we were not disappointed!!
I have stayed in some great 5 * hotels as part of my job and this hotel closely compares to them! From the welcome drink and amenity on arrival, to the room check in, the gorgeous spacious room, the brilliant attentive and friendly staff who could not do enough for you. A brilliant hotel!
A very good find!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Great hotel with a fantastic service and a really nice restaurant. All members of the staff are really service-minded. We also booked a car tour to see the emperor tombs south of Hue, and the guide was great. Very recommendable!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great value for money. The staff were all very communicative, helpful and friendly. I wasn't feeling very well on the first night so they made me ginger tea. The food was nice and very decorative. Room was spacious. It's quite conveniently located and motorvina rental company is opposite the hotel. Highly recommend exploring the area by scooter.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Most probably, actually definitely the best hotel I've stayed in so far in Vietnam. I really cannot fault them, they are accommodating, friendly and will do anything to help. The prices for one night's stay are very very cheap and what u get for it is much more than what you pay for, the rooms are very comfortable and clean. We had a fridge in our room with complementary water and fruit, on our arrival we were given drinks and fruit which made us feel like royalty. On our last day we where meant to go on a tour but it rained so we were allowed to extend our check out till 7 as our train out of Hue was at night, they deserve another star added to their rating!!! Amazing
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Convenient for restaurants in old town and walking distance to citadel and markets and close to the river. Comfortable room but duvet a bit too warm even with the air con on. Helpful staff who arranged a very helpful driver to take us to Hui An stopping at various sights en route.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel is in a narrow lane but in a great location. It is such a pleasant surprise to arrive and be greeted by such enthusiastic friendly people. Every member of staff from the doorman, reception and restaurant staff were polite, welcoming and enthusiast to help make our stay a memorable one. We were seated, served fresh juice, fruit and asked if we needed assistance to arrange a tour of the area. There a number of interesting sites including the Citadel, a boat trip on the Perfume River and trips into the countryside to various tomb sites along with a visit to one of many Pagodas. Within 10 minutes our next day was planned and we could settle into our comfortable room. We chose the superior room which turned out to be much more than we expected. A very large bed, big screen tv and a very modern bathroom with walk in shower. After so many showers over a bath this was a huge bonus. Everything was spotlessly clean with bathrobes and new towels. We were very impressed and could highly recommend this hotel. We would stay here again.
h_title_comment: Brilliant, the place to stay in Hue
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We were comfortable. Location kind of off the beaten track. Ok comfortable rooms but not the most friendly staff in Vietnam.
it was a so minute walk to the River and 35 minute to the imperial city. adequate
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We stayed two nights here and it didn't disappoint. For Â£16 a night we received fresh fruit and juice on arrival and our bags were taken to our room. We had complimentary drinks and fruit in our room. The service was excellent - they made sure we were happy and had plans for the day. Breakfast was great - unlimited fresh fruit and a menu from which you could order any number of dishes any number of times. The rooms and bathrooms were clean and toiletries provided. I actually don't know how they make enough profit as it's incredible value. Well done!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Our room was really nice and confortable. Everything was working well. Breakfast is good and plentiful, you can order as much as you want and the staff make sure you don't leave breakfast hungry at all! What really make this place special is the staff working there. They are exceptional, very attentive and dedicated!! Sally at the restaurant is really nice and on two occasion prepared us some snack to take with us as we were going cycling for the day! That's the little extra that make us wish to come back!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Arrived in Hue only for 2 nights and from stepping out of the taxi to the hotel the friendly welcome from all the staff was delightful.
The bell boys were more than friendly asking what we were doing for the day and always jumping up to open the door for you.
The reception staff were more than helpful offering welcome drinks and then given you a personal overview of how we were to plan our time here and helped us hire bike.
The restaurant staff were amazing and very inviting when we sat for breakfast, also helping to plan our day or give recommendedation on places to go.
The cleaners we friendly and made the rooms look like brand new.
Excellence throughout.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: I love this hotel. This was my second stay at Serene Palace. I was reminded of why I fell in love with it the first time; the staff is one of the friendliest staff you will meet in Vietnam. They smile every time you walk out for the day and greet you with the same great smile when you return. They engage you in a conversation because they are genuinely interested in getting to know you... not because it's required as part of their job. My room was spacious and super clean. The bed was large and comfortable. Meals at the restaurant were delicious with plenty of choices to choose from.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Last month we were traveling from north to south in Vietnam.
One of our stops was in Hue Serene Palace Hotel. It was very cosy and quiet. All staffs were very kind and helpful.
I gave our dirty things to laundry. Something was not OK. They arraged in two hours to make clean once more.
At our departure they apologized once more with tuft of flowers.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Computers in each room, incredibly accommodating, friendly staff! Such an amazing stay. You can keep ordering different dishes at breakfast and they give you fruit upon arrival as well. It felt like such a treat to stay there while I'm budgeting.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Very nice hotel close to restaurants. Clean spacious room with comfortable bed. Friendly helpful staff, delicious breakfast, good value.We also had dinner in the restaurant one night which was very tasty. Staff arranged transfer car to Hoi an , very enjoyable trip and good price. Would definitely recommend and stay here again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Incredibly friendly, helpful staff that will help you with all your queries and plans for Hue. (The people really were our highlight of our time in Hue) lovely restaurant with fantastic food. Hotel rooms themselves are very nice too and off the main road so most importantly very quite. Would strongly recommend.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Stayed two nights but only one full day. Room was large clean and perfectly acceptable. Location of hotel was good, you could access places easily on foot. For the money it would be tough it beat this place, highly recommend it.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed for 3 nights and loved the experience from the lovely warm welcome and helpful tour advice from Si.
Our room was on the 6th floor and clean and comfortable with a good bathroom, great value.
The restaurant was fantastic.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: From the moment we walked into the Serene Palace hotel I know we were going to be well taken care of! A friendly staff greeted us, had us take a set in the lobby and provided us with a wet towel to clean our face, fresh fruit and fruit juice! We were escorted to our room by a staff member and shown all the amenities of our room. The room was very clean, cozy and had the most comfortable beds! The a/c was already on and cold us off right away. Throughout the two days we were here the staff was so engaging by asking questions about our travels and provided us with anything we needed. Our friend needed to see a doctor and they called one to come to the hotel for the visit!!! We ate at the restaurant for breakfast and dinner which was great! Again such an amazing staff there also! Our server from the night before packed us a bag of fruit and had another staff member give it to us the next day. She knew we were traveling on motor bikes and sent us with some snack! So sweet!!! You can't go wrong with this hotel!!! We loved our stay here! Thank you!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: We stayed 4 nights in Hue and loved this hotel. Our room was large, very clean, very comfortable and quite. The hotel is well located and bikes are available for 2.00 day rental. The staff here are amazing and made sure we had everything we needed They offered us late check-out and a room where we could clean up and change before our evening flight. I would recommend this hotel without hesitation
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The staff here are so lovely it's amazing. They were always there to help and even made us a packed lunch when they heard we were doing a day trip to the DMZ. The room was very comfy and with a central location, this hotel is perfect for any visit to Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The staff were extremely helpful, respectful & couldn't do enough to help. The rooms are beautifully furnished with modern amenities ( tv, wifi, aircon, contemporary western bathrooms). Close to the centre of Hue so walking was no problem to access most restaurants, markets etc. Would definately recommend.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Absolutely one of the best hotel I have ever stayed in (including luxury 5+ hotels in Vegas like the Venetian).
The staff is incredible! The hotel's restaurant is #1 in Hue, the rooms are clean, tou have a private PC in the room, the staff get you everything you need right on the spot! The location is great just a few minutes walking to the main attractions, you have just found the perfect hotel in Hue! :)
p.s. the standard room is just fine, you don't need to upgrade it.
h_title_comment: Wooow!!! Amazing! One of the BEST!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Location/room
ok so this place is in an Alley Way but its also right next to a couple bars and it's away from all the hustle and bustle. Everything was walking distance. Our room was on the top floor, we had a balcony it was nice to actually see sunset from up there! Oh and they also had a computer in the room that has internet which I thought was great since I was still planning our trip out.

Staff
Amazing we were welcomed by Julia, Sophie and Amy. My BF's family is from Hue and during our whole trip it was hard for him to be understood by other dialects but oh was this place his happy place. From start to finish with our stay Julia was very informative on which places to eat and things to do in and around Hue. Overall the staff were friendly always had a smile on their face and just never missed a beat, they made us feel at home.

I can't wait to come back here. Thanks Everyone
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We had a great time here. The hotel rooms are large and spacious modern clean bathrooms. All of this was made even better by the friendly staff who were so welcoming. The breakfast is also delicious and varied.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
Arrived early yesterday morning after a tiring train journey from Hanoi. The hotel staff immediately greeted us with freshly squeezed fruit juice and local fruits. We were pleasantly surprised with our room, beautiful, so clean, modern and large.

All the staff are so friendly and accommodating, they cannot do enough to help.

We dined in the Serene Restaurant, we cannot praise it enough. The best food we have tasted so far in Vietnam. Again, the restaurant staff were so welcoming, genuinely friendly and professional. I would highly recommend both this hotel and restaurant.

Rita & Etienne
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This was my second time staying at Hue Serene Hotel & the second time was even better than I remember. Stayed here for 1 night. Managed to score the most amazing room with views over the city & a balcony. When we arrived we were exhausted after a motorbike trip from Hoi An that day. Had dinner at the restaurant downstairs & that was perfect and convenient. Staff were extremely friendly too. Room's were very clean and quiet. All staff were lovely and accomodating. Will definitely be returning to explore more of Hue's wonders.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
The Hue Serene Palace Hotel, along with its sited hotel in Hanoi, is simply one of the best hotels I've stayed at anywhere in the world...and I've travelled a lot. What makes this hotel (and its sister) so special is the staff. They are simply the best around. I've been to Vietnam three times and stayed here twice and it has been like coming home to family and friends. The rooms are spotless, the location is great, and it has the advantage of having the #1 rated restaurant in Trip Advisor in all of Hue located in the reception area of the lobby. I plan to come again in the near future and there is no where else to stay ...either in Hue or Hanoi...I'd even consider.

Thank you Si, Tuyet, Hien, and Sami...hope to see you again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
We arrived hot and tired and were met with juice, fruit and an icy face cloth - perfect.
We had booked a basic room and, after reading the other reviews, had asked for a quiet room as high as possible. We were upgraded to the top floor and a beautiful room.
There were none of the issues of other reviews - the bedding was clean, the bathroom perfect and the room immaculate. The only slightly odd thing was being asked to sign a form - just standard boilerplate - before we checked in. I imagine it's all included in the booking terms and conditions, so I found it unnecessary.
The staff were super-helpful and gracious; though we had booked out after only one day, they looked after our bags while we spent the day sightseeing and even let us use a shower when we came back - and sit in the air-conditioned lobby until it was time to go.
All in all the service was above and beyond, and for a very good price.
h_title_comment: Excellent service in a good hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We arrived late and the hotel welcomed us with a cool drink and opened the restaurant for us. Dinner and breakfast were both excellent. Great location and friendly staff. Rooms were big and very clean and ours had a balcony. The hotel were accommodating in every way. We will definitely be returning. Look out for Sally in the restaurant as she made our children's stay very special.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
The hotel is located in a small lane way and has the most wonderful staff. They are very attentive and engaging. The location is good and it is a short walk to the Perfume River.
The facilities are Ok but some small details like the water pressure was a bit lacking. Bedrooms are all comfortable and clean. For the price it was great value.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We arrived quite late for check in but we received such a warm and helpful welcome from all staff from bell boy to front desk. Went to wrong hotel which was funny due they have 2 hotels now. As we celebrate our wedding anniversary this trip. Hotel has organised a little cake and wine to celebrate with us which was touching. Hotel has laundry service with very reasonable prices and spa as well. Plenty of coffee shop around and market just 3mins walk away which so convenient. Over all we both enjoyed our stay and thank you for the great services you guys provided.
h_title_comment: Great prize and all about services
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Serene Palace was a good mid-range hotel in Hue in a very central location. We had a great room with a balcony overlooking the city. The bed was one of the more comfortable bedâ€™s weâ€™ve had along our travels in Vietnam. The room itself was spacious enough for two and generally pretty good quality. The bathroom wasnâ€™t great and the shower was a bit average always going hot, cold, warm.
The staff were great, very sweet and spoke excellent english. Breakfast was decent and we also ate dinner one night at the hotel and it was a really nice meal.

All in all, Iâ€™d recommend Serene Palace as a good option in Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Good value for money (less expensive than many of the other places we stayed). Clean and comfortable. The water pressure in the bathroom wasn't great but otherwise the room was lovely. The best bit about the hotel though was the staff who were all so lovely, welcoming and helpful - just delightful!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We stayed here for two nights as a family of four. The staff were super friendly and helped with booking a tour round the temples. We had a great guide called Hi who was super. Breakfast great, rooms spotless, a great place to stay in Hue.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: I had a great experience with the hotel. In particular the front desk staff were very helpful in checking in/out, laundry service and booking tours and travel. The restaurant food was good and reasonably priced also - great for when you don't want to go out for a meal.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: It was a great experience to be in Hue and i seemed to have chosen the best hotel to stay at. The staff is extremely friendly and helped with everything (renting the motorbike, laundry, bus ticket..). The room was big and clean, with some fresh fruit every day. The breakfast was the best i have had in Vietnam. Highly recommend.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
We only stayed one night, arriving around 11 am in the morning for an early check-in, then leaving by 9 am the next day on the next leg of our journey to Hoi An.
We booked the Junior Room but upon checking in, we were upgraded to the City View Room. This room is huge with long distances to cover getting from the dressing table to the bathroom! Everything worked except for the in-room desk-top computer which I could not access. With only an over-night stay, it was not an issue with me as I could still use my iPad.
We also ate at the restaurant for both our lunch and dinner and received a 10 % discount as a guest. Food was good with attentive service.
All in all, I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel as it gives you value for money for the price you pay,
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Good location with friendly staff and good sized and clean rooms. Breakfast was very good. Computer in the room was very useful. Hotel feels a little tired and could do with updating, especially the bathrooms. Wi-fi was very intermittent but apparently there were internet problems in Hue during our visit. Karaoke bar next door can be loud of a night so I would recommend a room on a higher floor.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Four days in Hue! We got picked up at the bus station!
The room is rather large and has air. The umbrella behind the door is convenient because
We had two big rains.
Restaurant provided great breakfast with good fruit assortment.
The main street Ng Cong Tru has nice restaurants from bun bo to Banh canh Nam Pho.
One minor complainthing is the lane or Kiet in front of hotel flooded in the big rain two days ago. That is more like a city problem.

The staff is friendly, polite and helpful. We bought a tour of the tombs and was not regretting it.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We were very impressed with this little gem of a hotel in Hue. Very comfortable , well appointed and well positioned , with very friendly service . The restaurant downstairs was also excellent . Really delightful stay , and very well priced as well.
Highly recommended !
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: When we arrived the staff were very attentive, we got our welcome drink and checked in quickly. They upgraded us to a family suite which was nice and spacious! The rooms were clean, and the beds were quite comfortable! Location was good, but overall Hue is a quieter town. Definitely recommend, great value and really nice people!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We stayed here for a few days as part of our two week Vietnam tour thru Swallow Travel, we both loved this place, the hotel look like it had recently been refurbished as our room looked very fresh. The added benefit was a top rated restaurant on the ground floor which we dined in on our first night, the food was yummy and the service was fantastic, especially from Nhi, she was amazing. In Fact all the staff were great.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
After a reasonably uncomfortable overnight trip on the train from Hanoi we arrived, tired, sore and hot in Hue but a short car ride from the Station was a little piece of heaven called the Serene Palace Hotel..
If you are not a good train traveler my tip is to fly to Hue rather than take the train. Both John and I love train travel and although it was less comfortable than others we have taken we still enjoyed it.
Any how back to the Serene Palace Hotel which again was conveniently placed in the heart of the city and again was surrounded by interesting local lanes and streets filled with Restaurants, Bars and great shopping.
This hotel is another boutique hotel of around 30 rooms and is well equipped with a good dining room, Bar and well appointed rooms.
The Serene Palace appears to be a new property in very good condition and the rooms and bathrooms were comfortable, large and well decorated.
The winning formula of this Hotel and its greatest Asset is the staff. From the very beginning the ease of the check in, welcome dink, ice cold face-washers and friendliness of the staff was both surprising and appreciated.
Breakfast in the restaurant was fresh, ample, suitable for travelers from all over the world with not only the buffet but a wide choice of cooked products.
We also Dined in the Restaurant at night and was surprised by the quality, presentation of the food and how extensive the menu was. ( if you do dine here ask for the Royal Spring Rolls and wait to be amazed by the dish you get ) We discovered that this Restaurant is No.1 on Trip Advisor's list for the City of Hue and we think this is well deserved
Here again the ability of the staff to speak English blew us all away and so I asked one of the young girls how they learned this skill. Her reply was that she learned it as part of a Hospitality and hotel course at University so it shows how determined Vietnam is to improve its image as a destination for Tourism.
Than you Hue Serene Palace, our Oasis in a hot City, for all your great care and making our stay so happy and comfortable.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Stay here and you won't regret it! We thought it was amazing value for money - big room, bell-boys carrying our bags, free fruit daily, amazing breakfast, computer in the room, good TV, lovely bathroom, brilliant staff and the number 1 ranked restaurant in Hue right inside the building!
h_title_comment: Our favourite hotel in 9 months of travelling Asia!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed in quite a few places during our Vietnam trip but this was easily our favourite! The staff were the friendliest and chattiest, with excellent English and made us feel genuinely welcome. Our room was really spacious with large comfortable beds, great aircon and even a jacuzzi bath! Breakfast was good and evening meals were really delicious and beautifully presented. Staff were helpful and efficient and organised laundry and train tickets for us. We were just sorry we didn't stay longer - 2 nights, 1 day just isn't enough time to explore Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: So I arrived at 7pm, after a long motorbike ride from Hoi Ann with a migraine. I was very ill, on arrival the staff served my group with freshly squeezed orange juice, fruit and a cold fresh rag for my head. They took my luggage to my room. When I came down in the morning they remembered how ill I was the night before and asked how I was feeling, which was a fantastic touch. The breakfast included was incredible and all you can eat! The staff even ran after me after check out because I left my phone charger!!! Staff such as Amy made my night and I cannot thank her enough. They help you with any needs and the only down side I would say is that I did not stay long enough!!!! Thank you so much
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
A 30 stroll from the citadel in a quiet side street, this lovely hotel fits the bill for convenience, friendly staff and reasonable food. We received a 10% discount on meals upon arrival and ate lunch there on a short stop over en route to Hoi An.
The room was very spacious as we selected the more expensive option but it was worth it even for one night.
The bathroom likewise was spacious and clean but could do with a bit more light over the vanity for applying make up or shaving.
All in all, a convenient, welcoming hotel off the main drags that ticks most boxes.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The hotel is situated at the end of a little dead end street. The staff was very very kind and professional. The room was ok: quite big, clean and confortable. Very good the buffet breakfast in the morning.
h_title_comment: Beautiful hotel in a good position
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
We booked this hotel before coming to Vietnam and we booked 5 nights, which we did not realise is far too long for Hue. My recommendation is that you only need 2 or 3 nights depending on arrival and departure times.
Our room is clean, tidy and well looked after. The thing that lets the room down is the bathroom. The bedroom is bright, spacious and modern and then you walk into a dingy little run-down bathroom. The ceiling tiles are stained and so is the bath. The shower is the worst we've had for hotels of a similar price - the shower head is too low down for taller people and it is quite weak. The little bottles of shower gel and shampoo are clearly refilled rather than replaced which seems a bit cheap since the labels on them have worn off making it difficult to work out which is which. The other negative about the room would be the tacky, plastic, sunflower bins. These don't really fit the style of the room and so they look out of place. Other than this the room is lovely but the bathroom lets it down.
Another thing would be the level of noise in this hotel. Every morning at 5am we were awoken to loud banging, slamming of doors, scraping of furniture, etc. We noticed that some rooms are being painted so we assume that it was staff but perhaps it was guests. The walls and floors are quite thin so you can hear your neighbours sometimes anyway. Either way we did not appreciate being woken this early every day.
Location is perfect. Right in the heart of the old town. Plenty of good restaurants nearby and within walking distance of the citadel. Plus taxis in this area are cheap if you don't want to walk to dinner.
The hotel restaurant is rated as the best in Hue and we can see why. Service is fantastic and the food is lovely too. There is a huge selection to choose from and we tried many dishes during our stay, all of which were delicious. If you stay here you have to try the restaurant! The breakfast was also good with the same service.
The general service of the hotel staff was good. Everyone was friendly and they helped us arrange some private cars and did some laundry for us which is a good price. The one negative would be that the first information we received on Hue and the attractions was rather limited unbeknownst to us. When we went to ask for some specific information the 2nd day, after we had visited the citadel. The lady informed us about the combination ticket for this and the royal tombs which would have saved us a significant amount of money. This was a little disappointing and we just paid individually in the end.
I can understand why this hotel is rated so well. It is fantastic value for money but we have stayed in some other hotels in Vietnam which have the same nightly rate and they are slightly better. The room, restaurant, location, and service here are all generally good. It was just the few things mentioned above which let it down for us.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
New, nice, clean hotel with the best restaurant in town.
Friendly hard working staff, especially Jenny and Amy.
Watch out the hot water in bathroom. It is very hot.
The AC sounds not powerful enough for top floor room. Relocated to 3th floor with balcony.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: the hotel is located in a cozy tight alleyway but the access is just one small inconvenience because the staff make up for all of that. it is a bright friendly place with superstar staff who earnestly care about your needs and are dedicated to making your stay pleasant an d enjoyable.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great hotel. Located down a side street which feels like an unmade road. It feels very safe. Very close to lots of restaurants and easy walking distance. The rooms are spacious and clean and quiet. The hotel staff are very knowledgeable and their English is very good. We had one full day and wanted to pack as much in as we possibly could. The staff made that happen with a boat ride to the Pagoda, a car to the Tombs and then to the Citadel. We were then given advice on good restaurants in the nearby area. The view from the front balcony rooms is good. Such good value. Definitely recommend it
h_title_comment: Great location for a short stay
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: The staff in Serene Palace hotel are really friendly and very helpful. Nice breakfast. Clean rooms. Went from Hue to Hoi An by car on hotel recommendation, there are four stop off points, well worth doing. Would recommend this hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
Loved this hotel. On a quiet street but an easy walk from the market
Rooms beautiful and included a computer as well as fresh fruit daily
Restaurant was so good I ate dinner there also. Your breakfast is cooked to your order. Wouldn't hesitate to return here
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Nice, clean, comfortable. Excellent service for this price range. After all the painful experiences in Vietnam we finally rested on soft beds. Breakfast was quite mediocre but not a disaster. Staff was friendly, professional and gave us some very good tips about local restaurants.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We stayed 2 nights. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Hotel is clean and recently reburbished. Rooms nice and air conditioning great. Very central location. Breakfast was good. Overall great value. It's down a lane which looks a bit scary but it is fine.
h_title_comment: Lovely hotel, great value and location
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
All I need to say..
Exceptional service
Fantastic food - recommend the prawns and the seafood vermicelli!
Good location, everything nearby and accessible
Very clean and all you could ever need!in a room especially liked the TV and computer facilities for personal use!
h_title_comment: Everything you could need from a hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Hue Serene Palace is a very nice modern hotel with spacious, clean, comfortable rooms. The staff was helpful, and the complimentary breakfast at the hotel was also fresh and great! Being a vegetarian, I requested they make me a vegetarian sandwich, which they were more than happy to do.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The Serene Palace is very conveniently located to access the sights and night market in downtown Hue, and most things are walkable. The hotel restaurant was reasonably priced, and the included breakfast allows for local and western options to be ordered fresh to suit any appetite. What really makes this hotel stand out, however, is the service, as the staff were always friendly, kind, and happy to fulfill any requests. The front desk booked for us a private car to tour the city, as well as train tickets to our next destination with a very reasonable service fee (I believe it was 10%, and well worth it as they booked and delivered the tickets to us within a few hours). Highly recommend given the price and service.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Good quality hotel at a very reasonable price. Our room was comfortable with a nice balcony overlooking the city. Breakfast was good and staff were friendly and helpful. Just what you'd expect for a 3* hotel - no more, no less.

Bed linen and towels were clean but a little worn and could probably be replaced. The shower was not very powerful - took ages to rinse! Charged 2% to pay by credit card which didn't happen in any of the other hotels we stayed in in Vietnam.

There was very little wrong with this hotel but I don't feel able to enthuse about it. This may be because we'd just come from a really super 4* hotel in Hanoi and it just wasn't quite the same standard. However it was good value and I would recommend it.
h_title_comment: Nice hotel, good location, helpful staff.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Don't be fooled by the grimy lane the hotel is located on, Hue is a slightly grimy city anyway. Staff are lovely of course, and the breakfast is great. It is a la carte, but order as much as you feel like. Bare in mind, the spa is not located at the hotel, but about 5 minutes away in a different hotel. Room service was very quick and a nice standard also.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We made a motorcycle trip from Ho-Chi-Minh-City to Hanoi and found the hotel via TripAdvisor. It is a little bit hidden, in a small Street, but because of this it is also a very quiet location.
From our first day we where very pleased with the whole service team, especially when a friend of mine had some health problems and we needed some support for the hospital. They called a driver and one of the receptionists accompanied us throughout the whole evening for translation and did everything to help us.
Every morning they prepared some food for my friend in the hospital and asked if they could help us. They even lowered the price of our hotel room a little bit and gave us one day for free, just as little support!
To keep a long story short, I would recommend everybody to take the Serene Hotel in Hue! Even the restaurant inside the hotel has an enormous number of tasty food!
Apparently, the place has always been very popular for tourists form a lot of nations.
h_title_comment: So far the best Service I have ever recognised in Vietnam, especially for the Price!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We stayed at the Serene Palace on the recommendation of another couple. We completely agreed with the fantastic review they gave the hotel, the rooms are wonderful, it's brilliant value for money and the staff couldn't do more for you (plus you have the #1 restaurant in Hue according to trip advisor serving your breakfast! And lunch and dinner if you choose) They made us feel so welcome and were very accommodating and helpful. We couldn't have asked for more. Many thanks Serene Palace Hotel!
h_title_comment: Amazing customer service and value for money
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
For what we paid for, Serene Palace was certainly head and shoulder above its class. Although it was located on a side street, there was no issue walking in and out to where we wanted to go. Well located to move around in the city with ease. Hotel room is big, clean, comfortable, good air-con under the hot weather and most of all, friendly service from door man to reception to the service staff in the restaurant.

Hearty breakfast selection from the menu which also included local food like Pho. The egg omelette with the stuffing was really tasty and yummy!

Great Job Serene Palace!!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Arrived at the front door to be greeted by 2 lovely men who welcomed us so nicely. The reception were fantastic and I felt safe and comfortable immediately. It was super hot so lovely to get into our clean room with nice AC. We had two nights and the meals at the restaurant were fantastic. The breakfast was really lovely. Perfect stay. Such great value for money. Thank you so much.
h_title_comment: EXCELLENT PLACE TO STAY IN HUE
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The staff here is top-notch, the food is excellent, and it is close enough to old town to walk. We had a wonderful time! I wish we would've had a longer stay in Hue. It's a nicer town than Ho Chi Minh City for sure. The nightlife is fun and there are fun things to explore.
h_title_comment: Great Hotel in a Convenient Location!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
Value for money, excellent staff/service, fresh breakfast, very good restaurant, good safe location and perfect room.
Everything was perfect ! I recomande this hotel for anyone who wants to visit Hue.
h_title_comment: Great stay at Serena palace hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Friendly staff, quiet location and close to a moped hire place. They organized a tour to the elephat spring and it was one of the best days ive had in vietnam. Free water and good English very professional
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Where to start?
The smiles and the availability of the people are the first thing that accompanied our staying. They have been always very kind and talkative and helped us in giving all the information we needed for our staying in Hue.
The room was very clean, well furnished and with all confortables.
The breakfast: the only place in which we staying in Vietnam (we stayed in Hanoi, Sapa, Da Nang and Hoi An) with so much fruit at the buffet....very delicious! We had also the just prepared scrabled eggs and the local food...delicious!
The best accomodation of our trip!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This is hotel is everything you would want, helpful staff who seem very happy to talk to you. It's the little things, the waitress at breakfast spoke for ages about how she loved England. Everyone greats you as you come in! They open doors, smile! The room was really big with a large bath too! I loved it here!! Oh, and the smoothies are too good probably the best I've had in Asia.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
The hotel was able to arrange a late pick up from the airport with one of their drivers. Ride was about 20 mins or so. Most hotels and hostels in Hue are located in alleys, the Serene Palace Hotel no different. There are signs at the ends of the alley to help navigate, though I did miss the sign a few times. On our second day, one of the front desk staff approached us at breakfast and asked us when we arrived and said she was worried that we'd get lost because we never got a map of the area. Seems like they take their customer service seriously and I appreciate that she approached us to make sure that we got the same treatment as guests she had previously greeted. The beds are extremely comfortable! And the room is very clean. There is seasonal fruit left in your room each day. We got green bananas and passion fruit, both were perfectly ripe and sweet!! There is even an umbrella in the room for your use. 5 stars for the room and staff!

The buffet was ok. The fresh fruit and juices and bread are self serve and you order your main items off the menu with the waitress. I like this idea because it leaves much less food waste at the end of a buffet. On the menu there are some Vietnamese soups, eggs+bacon/sausage, pancakes among other options. The fried rice with garlic and egg is recommended but I think you can eat outside of the hotel for other meals.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Serene Hotel Palace is an excellent place for a short stay in the historic city of Hue. The quality of accommodation and service beyond the 3-star hotel. The rooms are well-equipped, even have a computer. The breakfast is first-rate. The staff is friendly and helpful. The only complaint is the difficult access to the hotel with the larger car. Because of that we landed about 100 meters from the entrance to the hotel and had to cross walking with all the luggage. The hotel deserves the highest rating!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: The hotel is close to the center and restaurants, rooms are very clean, good breakfast and staff very friendly from the arrival to the departure. Good place to stay for a visite of Hue palace. Did not test the restaurant but seems to be one of the good one in Hue.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
If we had to make a Top 3 list of all hotels during our 3-week Vietnam trip, Serene Palace would definitely be in there. The location is a bit strange (it's in the middle of a local alley) but once you're inside - WOW!

It's a spacious, luxurious and clean hotel with super friendly staff (they brought us some free bites, drinks and cold towels when we arrived) that helped us a lot with getting around in Hue. Most of them speak excellent English, so that helps.

The rooms have the same characteristics as the hotel: spacious, luxurious and clean. We almost felt bad being in the city that much and not in the room.

For the price you pay, this hotel cannot be beaten. You get a lot of value for your money. Plus, the hotel has a great restaurant to boot (#1 on TripAdvisor).

The only bad thing I can say is that the view of some of the rooms (including ours) was not very nice; there was a wall just outside our room with a dirty airco unit placed against it. Didn't matter that much though, since we were out and about most of the time anyway.

All in all, you won't regret booking here.
h_title_comment: One of the best hotels of our Vietnam trip.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
The street that takes you to the hotel needs to be asphalted, but the hotel itself is absolutely advisable.

Our room was large, with an also big bathroom with shower and decorated with style. We felt very comfortable.
h_title_comment: Large, luxury room and a profesional staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Great hotel, clean comfortable beds, spacious rooms, very friendly and helpful staff.
The breakfasts were delicious. The location was great and easy walk to all attractions.
Safe area where you felt very comfortable walking around at night. Would recommend
to anyone.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Our flight was delayed and we arrived to the hotel quite late. All the restaurants were closed, so we asked the staff if there was any possibility to get a sandwich or some fruits from their kitchen. They do not seem interested in helping. On the other hand, we requested some information on Hue to plan the day after but the boy who checked us in told us to go the day after straight to the reception.
Besides this, the day after our arrival the front desk was really helpful. The girl in charge of tourist information organized our day at Hue in order to see everything.
Finally, we also use the laundry service which was perfect.
h_title_comment: Some inconveniences due to a late check-in
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Loved it! Best hotel in Hue! Checked in after a difficult time to find it but once I got there! Now, people, don't let appearances deceive you. The street it's on is not the best. Get past that. The hotel itself is great. The staff-amazing-all of them. The rooms-amazing-I stayed in a standard and a deluxe and I must say I enjoyed the standard more. They are comfortable in every way, the deluxe has a bath and sitting area as well as a balcony. The food was acceptable. I did have an unpleasant experience on my last day but I think this was an exception. I ate some fruit which I'm sure had been accidentally washed in local water. I didn't eat again that day and the next morning I had travellers curse. The doctor I saw confirmed it was likely to be caused by local water drinking. Having only drunk bottled water and nothing else on the way of food. But-again-I would go back again for sure.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
I stay 4 days 3 nights in this hotel. We are 2 adult and 1 baby. We book a deluxe room with balcony and have a city view of hue.

They have very wonderful service and even remember my son name. The room in clean as the picture as. The bed is extra large and can fit 2 adults with 18 month baby. It was lovely stay.

One thing i dont like is the water pressure not so strong on our room. Nevertheless this hotel deserve 5 star review cause they will go extra mile to accomodate you. They understand my needs cause i bring baby. My baby loves the fish pond and he had a lot fun there.

They provide laundry service for 2 usd/kg. So it convinient for me to wash my family clothes everyday.
h_title_comment: Small hotel in the alley with fantastic service.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: My friend and I are so satisfied about their service: clean and comfort room and nice staff as their ads. It is better to rent a motorbike to go around the city than take a taxi or "xe Ã´m". Hue vegetarian food is so delicious and cheaper than other cities.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: Staff are super friendly and food was real nice. We had the burgers which weren't bad. The chips are not my favorite, little shoestring frys, but that's a personal choice. It is a bit hard to find. The gps marker lead us down the wrong road. But so worth the effort.not the cheapest but tasty after eating asian food for 7 weeks.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed here for 3 nights. As there were changes to our flight, we had to change our hotel dates on the day we were supposed to arrive and the hotel was very accommodating at no extra cost. The location of the hotel is good and was not facing the main road so it was quiet. Lots of food options around the hotel with a cute vespa cafe down the street. The staff was amazing and made our stay a very pleasant one.

The hotel was clean and the bed was comfortable. The wifi was also strong. The breakfast was made to order instead of a typical buffet and the food tasted great. We also booked private cars with the hotel and everything went smoothly, particularly our car ride from Hue to Hoi An. Highly recommended!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: this hotel is in a tiny laneway between bustling roads.. it was extremely hot when we visited so we rested quite a bit in the large family room. We didnt hear any noise from outside and were at the front on level 3. the staff were amazing and carefully helped us book some great tours specifically tailored for our children , 3 and 5. The restaurant deserves its number 1 rating, we had the lunch special... perfect to try local dishes.. very clean and excellent customer service
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Stayed here for 3 nights. Great location within walking distance of tourist attractions such as the imperial city. All the staff were very friendly and provided as much information as you needed about city tours, etc. Really helpful, can also arrange for rental of motorbikes to explore the city yourself which was fantastic. The restaurant on the ground floor serves delicious Vietnamese food, would recommend eating there at least once. The room we had was lovely, spacious and clean. No complaints, would happily return
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I have only stayed in the hotel for 1 night, however, this hotel is worth the recommendation. The staffs are so professional and when you arrive, you will have a welcome drink and drinks. The staff will explain to you the places of interest around Hue and even will recommend you what are worth visiting and what are not. The room is nicely decorated and and very spacious.
h_title_comment: Amazing Staff, Quite and Nice Hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Overall good value. They arranged pickup from the train station to the hotel for $4 USD. Clean bedding and towels, clean room, in-room safe, mini-fridge, and computer. Comfy bed. Good breakfast buffet. The only thing that was less than ideal was the slightly weird shower curtain - the tub was quite high (you had to step up into it) and the shower curtain was a bit short and had to go inside the tub with you while you showered and it tended to float up and touch your legs.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Location was great, right inside the city and within easy walking distance of many restaurants. The staff were extremely friendly and the in-site restaurant was fantastic, whether dinner or breakfast. The rooms were comfortable, if a bit on the small side, but otherwise very well appointed and clean. The hotel is located next door to a Karaoke club, but we never heard a sound.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
My parents are travelling to Vietnam and I wanted to surprise them by having a nice card and bottle of wine in the room for when they arrived. I emailed the hotel asking if they would be able to provide such a service and I received a quick and very polite response from a lovely lady called Rose.

She was more than happy to help me and after I paid a small fee she went out and purchased a lovely card, bottle of wine and some fruit for their arrival. She then sent me a few photos of what she had done.

I havenâ€™t even stayed in this hotel but from my experience with the customer service so far, if I ever visit Vietnam I would be sure to give this place a try!

Fantastic, friendly, excellent communication and willing to go that extra mile
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: For the reasonable price of this hotel, my expectations weren't high, but I was wrong! It was spotlessly clean and gleaming in every inch. The beds were very comfortable, and the AC was not overpowering (which can affect sleep quality). The location was pretty good, too--near the restaurant street and a pleasant 30-minute walk from the Citadel. I really recommend this place!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: This is a very good hotel and exceptional value. It was central, quiet, easy to locate and most importantly the staff were friendly and efficient. The service offered was more akin to that found in quality five star hotels without any of the fuss or the price tag. Don't hesitate...book now as it may be full if you leave it to the last minute.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
I was travelling with my family. We had two rooms with balcony, very nice. The rooms are moderns, comfortable, good bed.
The best was the breakfast.. a lot of choices, vietnamit and european; and really nice waitress.
h_title_comment: Comfortable hotel, the best breakfast in vietnam!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Great hotel! The service was good. They helped us book a private tour and a bus to Hoi an. The breakfast was nice, we had fruit salad, juice and coffe and then you ordered your meal. We had vegetable noodle soup and a rice dish. All in all a good place to stay when in Hue.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The hotel and restaurant are fabulous. The staff are very friendly, you are offered fruit and a welcome drink when you arrive and the rooms are large clean and modern. The restaurant is very reasonably priced and it's clear why it's rated as the top in Hue. This hotel definitely provides a better service than the 3 stars it says.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We had arranged pick-up from Hue Station and although we were met, we were slightly disappointed that the arranged transport was a regular taxi that would have been quicker and cheaper had we just taken one from the station forecourt. That aside, everything else about the hotel was excellent. The fact that the hotel is located on a narrow side-road is of no consequence, other than providing a quiet location. We arrived before normal check-in time and fortunately a room was available and kindly made available for us. The rather ordinary reception belies the quality of the bedroom, which was first-class. Although not huge, our room was roomy enough for our 2-night stay and was quiet, well furnished and immaculately clean with efficient air conditioning and a good over-bath shower. The friendly reception staff spoke good English and were very helpful in arranging motorbike hire and a DMZ tour, which was excellent with a very knowledgable and informative guide. We had breakfast and dinner at the hotel and found the food to be very good quality although the servings were able rather than generous. The service was excellent and Ivy always had a willing smile. All in all, outstanding value for money and just what we needed for a 2-night stay on our busy itinerary.
h_title_comment: Very good hotel with outstanding service
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
As other reviewers have stated itâ€™s down a very narrow road that seems to always have building or road work going on which is a shame as the hotel itself is a little gem. We stayed here for 2 nights to allow us to take a couple of tours along the Perfume River and visit a couple of other sites including the Imperial Palace and Royal Tombs. For that the hotel location was no trouble. They arranged everything. We stayed in a Junior Suite as there were 4 of us (2 adults, 2 kids) and it was more than big enough and very clean. We were at the front of the hotel but heard no noise. The room had a PC with internet. Room facilities all worked and it had a great shower. As a hotel it was very good and we really only wished it had a pool.
The staff were excellent. Very attentive and friendly and took care to acknowledge the kids. The tour desk and reception did their job very well and were very efficient and friendly.
We had breakfast and dinner at the hotel due to the convenience of it more than anything else especially after a hard day touring! Again, nothing wrong with this although Iâ€™d want a little more if I was staying more than 2 or 3 days.
Yes Iâ€™d stay here again because of the hotel itself and the staff.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Everything about this hotel is amazing. Great room facilities, restaurant really fab food, but above all the staff make your stay so enjoyable, easy and happy. This hotel is the best I have stayed in Vietnam. Quiet place in a small lane but don't judge.Enjoyed it immensely.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: This hotel suited us very well for the 2 nights in Hue. Its not a flashy place but if like me you are looking for somewhere clean, a comfortable bed, great aircon, splendid staff service and highest standard of English from the reception to the farewell, then you will love this hotel. Did I mention that it also has the #1 restaurant in Hue? They arranged a local driver for us to see the tombs and palace and it was a reasonable price and a big thanks to our driver Hi for his service. The only slight drawback is that its in a slightly hard to find small lane so use google maps and you should be fine.
h_title_comment: Great value, clean and superb staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This was the few hotel that I stayed in that I wish I was there longer.
The Hotel was clean and fresh and modern. Rooms were a great size. Staff were polite, friendly and helpful.
Location was perfect.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
We spent one night in Hue at this hotel.

Location is on a side road right next to a Karaoke Lounge...

We checked in around 11:30pm and the karaoke lounge was in full swing... Our spacious & comfortable room seemed to be on the karaoke lounge side, so the loud music kept us awake until about 2 am...

The room itself was very clean and spacious. The bathroom was modern with all necessary amenities and very clean.

The breakfast of all you can eat off the menu was ok... The local food tastier than the western menu.

The staff are Super friendly and helpful. Even though we had checked out at 8am, they stored our luggage while we toured the charming city and attractions of Hue. When we returned hot and sweaty, they allowed us to use their facilities to shower & freshen up. Which was very kind and thoughtful!

Apart from the loud music, stay was good. Suggest when booking room, make sure you request a room far from karaoke lounge!

Good value for money accommodations.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
We got a free tomato salad starter here which was very nice.

We ordered the bacon burger and the spaghetti bolognese. Both were excellent.

We both had the chocolate mousse which was also very good. Cold, ice-cream-like. Very different to what we are used to but very well-prepared!

For drinks we had a big bottle of water to share.

The total bill was 294.000 dong, so we rounded it up to 300.000. This small tip was definitely worth it because they offered us a 10 percent discount coupon for our next visit. PLUS 2 coupons for a free cocktail when bought one for another place (which they probably own).

I know it's all business but better this than nothing. Staff was friendly, food was very good and not at all expensive for a restaurant like this.

I know a comparison is not so representative but just for fun:

Salad: 6 â‚¬
Bacon burger: 8 â‚¬
Spaghetti: 12 â‚¬
Big water: 4 â‚¬
Chocolate x2: 12 â‚¬

TOTAL Belgium: 42 â‚¬
TOTAL Vietnam: 12 â‚¬ wow!

We understand this is top listed at TA and we will most certainly come back here.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The hotel was in a good location. The staff were very polite, friendly and helpful. The room service was prompt. The service in the restaurant was great. They took great care to detail. The breakfast was also excellent with a special mention of the excellent pancakes and crepes.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: We have traveled for 3 weeks in Vietnam, this is by far.the Best.hotel (value for money wise). Very friendly staff, Nice big.clean rooms. Really good breakfast too. Nothing to complain about, and they also.helped with travel to hoi an. My greatest recommandation!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Stayed her for two nights with family, my husband became unwell on our first day and the staff were very concerned and made him some lovely ginger tea, rooms are big and clean, laundry is excellent and great rate. Restaurant is fantastic and well deserves being no 1 on tripadvisor, Sally is wonderful and efficient. Down a small side road. The hotel can be a little noisy due to doors slamming, this could be remedied by adding insulation around doors. Air con good in room but slow wifi .
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family
