Dinner at the restaurant was very good. Only issue was some construction going on in the hotel, but it was only during the day.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed here at the Serene Palace Hotel in July 2015 for 3 nights - we scored a room upgrade for free (good start).
Lovely Hotel with elevator and very helpful staff - not too over the top service but very efficient and detailed.
Great advice about local restaurants and attractions from the lovely reception staff and map provided (we like to wander).
Tours and transport arranged at reception- even last minute stuff - no worries.
Good breakfast provided and free water. Good AC and hot water etc.
Rooms immaculate and well serviced - No complaints.
Definitely stay there again!!
Location is within walking distance to town and even the Citadel - down a quiet lane - quirky (as in keeping with Vietnam).
Good wifi and an in room computer.
restaurant well rated - we tried the dessert - yummy
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed at Hue Serene Palace in July, and our stay was most pleasant. The location of the hotel is a bit off the beaten path, but so are most of the hotels in Hue. Our room was huge, clean and nice. We tried the restaurant based on tripadvisor reviews and where not disappointed. The best part thought is the lovely staff in the restaurant. They even packed us lunches on the day we left.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Very good hotel. Rooms are nice, clean comfortable, quiet and spacious. The location is great, 15 minutes walk to the imperial city. Welcome drinks, fruits and smiles. the staff is always willing to assist you in any way they can always smiling. Very good customer service. WIFI is the gest i had in my whole trip in Vietnam. Breakfas was also the best I got in Vietnam. I wish I could have stayed longer and definitely will come back. I strongly recommend this hotel, go there you will not be disappointed.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
This was a great find for us. We originally booked one night but on arrival decided to stay two nights and we were upgraded to a Junior Suite for free :) The bed was huge and the room spacious and cool. The shower was the best we have had so far in our week and a half travelling around Vietnam. The staff are so helpful, the offered us a few options for touring Hue and the DMZ but without pressure so once we had thought about it we booked a private tour to the DMZ for $100 for both of us. It was very worth it. Our guide, Tom, was from Dong Ha, had impeccable English and was in the area in the War and spoke from first hand experience. He took us to parts of the Vinh Moc tunnels that you don't normally see on a guided tour (because they were pitch black!).
The staff also went to the train station and bought our tickets to Hanoi for us to save us the hassle of going out to the station (more time for soghtseeing). I've had a bad cold since arriving and the restaurant staff kindly brought me a ginger, lemon and honey tea after seeing me suffer...A very welcome surprise!
We were able to leave our bags on check out, freshen up before our long train journey and even got a complimentary food parcel to take with us!
You won't be disappointed with anything here, it is excellent all round!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We stayed here for one night and would have happily stayed longer if we had more time. On arrival we were given complimentary drinks and fruit and then shown to our beautiful room that had a computer and all mod cons. Location of the hotel was great and the restaurant was delicious!! Staff were very attentive and friendly the porter went above and beyond his duty by carrying our bags to the bus the next day.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed here for three nights. The staff were attentive and ensured we had everything we needed. The room was clean and comfortable. Staff were very good and spoke good English. We used the hotel as a base to visit the DMZ. The staff were happy to help with arranging a trip to the Tomb of Ming Manh. The hotel restaurant had good food and service also.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This is an excellent hotel. The staff are wonderfully thoughtful and among the the best I've stayed with. The room was spacious and very clean. The location is good. You should definitely eat there!! I'm not one to eat in hotels but the menu was so delicious and so reasonably priced (I think about 21 AUD for food, two cocktails and a beer). Don't think twice - just book!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Having lived and travelled in Vietnam for 20 years, this is without doubt the best value I have experienced. The staff are all young highly motivated charming people, who cannot do enough to please. The Hotel is bright and spotlessly kept, with a generous and varied breakfast menu. Beds comfortable and rooms well furnished with even a PC provided and free Wifi.
Cannot wait to return
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights in July.
From even before arriving to the hotel the staff were so helpful (we emailed ahead to book and extra night accom and a pickup trasnfer from Da Nang airport). Our flight from Ha Noi was late so we didn't get in to Da Nang till midnight and then a 2 hour drive to Hue. The staff were aware we were coming in late and after a long day of travel checked us in at 2am and were so welcoming and helpful! Most of the staffs english is very good!
The rooms are spacious and clean. Aircon very good. Location is down a quiet alleyway that is located close to some good places to eat. The breakfast here is good, there is an array of fruits, plus a menu to order eggs/pancakes/pho etc. Good range!
My only complaint is that the hotel is quite noisy. There isn't much sound barrier between the rooms and corridors. If you're looking for a sleep in, you might find it hard here. Other than that, can't fault this place! Really good value!!!!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Our favorite hotel on our trip in Vietnam. Amazing value for money also.

- We had a bad situation when we arrived that she was feeling quite ill with stomach problems. We were too early for our room to be available, but they accommodated us by letting us use a deluxe room that was already prepared for somebody arriving later. Then they would have had to clean this room again later. This was a very thoughtful gesture. The staff also provided great advice about where to go to buy medicine.
- The restaurant is especially good. The testing menu with local Hue food was outstanding, and the pho in the morning was particularly nice. In addition, the staff gave good advice about a couple of nearby restaurants, including one that was for locals only and looked a bit rough from the outside but was quite tasty!
- Everything about the room was perfect, including a high quality bed, A/C, refrigerator, quiet, good water pressure, etc.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
I must admit to being surprised when our driver turned into a small dusty lane saying "your hotel is down here".
The car stopped at the doors, two doormen ran down the stairs to retrieve our bags, and from then, until we left three days later, everything was perfect. The front office staff were caring, the waiting staff were helpful, and the doormen were friendly.
Our room had an aircon problem that was fixed immediately.
The hotel is within a 5 minute walk to a number of restaurants and cafes.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel is great! We stayed for 2 nights and had a nice big room with a wonderful shower and some serious Air Con!! There is even a computer in the room for whatever you need. The staff was extremely friendly, and happy to help anyway they could!! The restaurant is fantastic too, but that's a whole other excellent review!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel is in a great location. It is down a lane way but is so quiet. The staff were all so friendly and helpful. This must be a very well run hotel as all the staff were happy and all appeared to enjoy their jobs. The rooms are large and very comfortable. The hotel restaurant is excellent. Try their set menu of Hue dishes. Fantastic hotel. Would highly recommend. It is easy and cheap to get a taxi to the Citadel. Just around the corner from the main backpacker area.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Our experience at this hotel was among the best on our month-long SE Asian travels. We received a complimentary room upgrade, very comfortable and with a fantastic view. Staff sat us down with a complimentary drink to help us plan the best way to see what we wanted to see while in Hue - we managed to fit in a long visit to the Citadel, walking the town, a riverboat tour, and tours of several tombs and a nearby pagoda in two days. Since one of the tricks in Hue is that many sites are spread out, staff helped us figure out what was most feasible, in what order, and arranged transportation for us. While we prefer to explore (and did check out) several other restaurants in Hue, the Serene Restaurant in the hotel itself served some of the best food we ate in Vietnam. Hue Serene Palace is highly recommended!
h_title_comment: Incredible staff support, luxurious for the price, and on top of one of the best restaurants in Hue
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We loved our stay at Serene Palace Hotel. We are a family of 5 and had two rooms for two nights. The staff were amazing and the rooms were perfect. The food was good and the hotel was close to everything in town. It is also on a quiet side street too which was nice. We highly recommend this hotel if you are visiting Hue. Happy travels.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
This Hotel is well placed within Hue with some great restaurants placed close by and the back packer area and Perfume River within five minutes walk. The Hotel is new clean and the staff are simply outstanding. We booked into this hotel as it is part of the Holiday Hotel Group and having stayed in the Groups Hanoi Charming 2 Hotel where we were also very happy it was an obvious choice. Easy to find transport at the end of the street either Cyclos or Taxis for the longer trips. As is par for Vietnam the maps of the area are not accurate distance wise so check with the hotel before wandering off to an attraction which seems close and may not be so.
Good value Hotel recommended.
h_title_comment: Great Hotel Good Location and Great Service
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
After some trouble with a different hotel in Hue, we checked into this palace down the road. Greeted by friendly and welcoming staff we were given welcome drinks and fruit before being shown to our spacious and clean room.

The staff took the time to sit down with us to show us the best points in the city and offered us deals on tours. All the staff were very friendly (Emily and Tina in particular).

The hotel restaurant had amazing traditional food and the room service was very quick.

We stayed here for three amazing nights and can honestly say it made our trip in Hue. We would really recommend this hotel to anyone!

Karen & Dan
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
I'm terribly lazy at writing reviews, but the service and attitude at this hotel was so excellent I simply have to add my comment. We arrived early in the morning after an awful night at sleeper bus (I'd never choose that again...). I had got sick in the bus plus we felt tired and dirty, so I asked if they'd have a room available - and they didn't only give us a room immediately but also upgraded to a bigger room with a balcony, and all that free of charge! We really appreciated that. In general, all the staff was very friendly, helpful, always greeting us with a smile. Also the restaurant staff was great. We don't usually like to use hotel restaurants, but since the breakfast had been excellent and we had read some good reviews about the food, we decided to dine there. The reviews were correct: food was tasty and there were enough choices for vegetarians as well, but again the best thing was the service, quick, friendly and even more: we had been given discount coupons on arrival but we had forgotten them totally, and were thus expecting to pay the normal price - but the waitress who recognized us from the breakfast gave the discount automatically! What could be better service? I wish I could remember her name so I could address my thanks to her.
All in all, we were happy with our stay. As said our room was very spacious, beds were comfortable and air conditioning worked well. If I were asked for improvements, I suggest getting new towels - the old ones were quite worn - and new bathroom curtains.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Really good value for money!

The location is great. It is near a lot of nice restaurants and the back packer street. You can walk to the river front and to the citadel. It is located in a quiet alley so there is not much noise from the street at night.

The room we had was excellent (city view room). It had everything one might need - even a computer (perfect for checking out great restaurants at TripAdvisor :)). The room was clean, spacious and comfortable. We also had a balcony.

All the staff member are very professional, speak good English and are very polite and helpful. They helped us arrange a tour to the tombs and also a boat trip to the pagoda. We also went to the beach one day (Beach bar Hue - the beach is awesome). The hotel arranged a car for us and it took approx 30 min to get there - very nice to get a break from all the cultural sightseeing and relax on the beach for some hours.

Breakfast is really nice, you can order as much as you like from their menu (and the staff keep coming and ask you: are you sure you donÂ´t want some more? One more pancake?). If you are on a diet, this is not the place for you. :)

I am very glad we stayed in this hotel and I really recommend it.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: I recommend this place as the rooms were comfortable, clean and noise free. The breakfast was by the menu but you could have as much as you fancied. The waitresses did not miss a trick and were always on hand. My father accidentally slipped down the stairs and they could not do enough to attend to him. It is down an alley but perfectly placed for visiting hue and the surrounding eateries.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Don't even think about booking at a different hotel! We stayed at the Serene Palace for 5 nights, and it was one of the best hotel experiences we ever had. If there was a six star option, they would have got it. Although being a big hotel, every staff member knew us by name, and cared personally for our well being and good time. We booked several day tours through the reception, and they were all for a fair price, and most of them (all but one, that was a group tour with an external company) were of superb quality.
The rooms are big, with all the amenities you need. You are given a free plate of fruit every day, along with the regular water bottles. They even have bathrobes, which are not common in hotels in this price range.
The restaurant is hands down the best in the city, and we ate several meals there. The local food is of top quality, and in very cheap prices. The included breakfast is also very good, and you can get some good Vietnamese coffee. The best aspect in the restaurant though is the amazing staff, commandeered by the lovely and very professional Hien (Sally). You are treated as one of the family. I was sick one day, and kept getting free ginger-lemon tea, during dinner, and even to my room. When we left for tour, even at 6:30am, there was always breakfast, and we were always handed a bag of fresh fruit for the day. We were very sad to leave all our new friends when we continued our trip - tears were shed on both sides.
So to sum it all up, you would have a hard time finding a hotel with this quality of service even for double the price - so what are you waiting for?
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
The HuÃª Serene Palace Hotel is defined by its friendly and accommodating staff. They aim to make your stay as enjoyable as possible and help to ensure you make the most of your stay.

Rooms are very comfortable, very clean and of a good size with air conditioning, safe and mini bar.

We asked the staff to coordinate some laundry as well as a day your of the city. Both were actioned smoothly.

Would definitely stay again!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
As with all the other reviews, we found this place absolutely faultless. Prior to even arriving they sent emails about airport transfers rather than us having to contact them. They replied emails very fast and transfers were easy. Every single employee from the receptionist to the housekeeping, waitresses and drivers were very friendly and easy to talk to. Special thanks to Mary, the guy and girl at the front desk who talked to us about the tombs, and the two waitress who served us!

The front desk staff spoke fluent English and were very helpful - they helped us book things and recommended restaurants and attractions. When we were running out of time to go to the tombs, they arranged an early schedule prior to our train so we could visit and make the most of our time.

The restaurant had fantastic service and one of the best meals we've had in Vietnam. My fav was the pomelo salad and my bf loved the bun bo hue. Breakfast was also excellent with great coffee, fruit & whatever you'd like to order.

Everything was very thoughtfully considered such as the slippers in the room being larger sizes (we're both tall with bigger feet than Vietnamese people), fresh fruit and juice on arrival and the air con in the room already on as we checked in. It's these little details that set Serene apart from the rest.

The only issue was I booked a double and was meant to get a king sized bed but ours was two twin mattresses put together.

Whatever Serene is doing to train it's staff, they are doing it right. Keep up what you're doing, we will definitely be back! Thank you for everything!

Jess & Jay
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
From outside the place looks small but once inside the place is big and bright.

I can't decide which was best; the staff, the room or the food.

All the staff were very polite and seemed genuinely interested in our plans during our stay. During check in we were given cold drinks, fresh fruit and cold towels. The staff offered good advice and maps to places of interest. They even booked and collected tickets for us from the train station. When we checked out the porters even wanted to come to our room to carry the bag down.

The breakfast is one of the best. A mix between buffet and a la carte and you can order as much as you like. The morning of our departure I decided to fill up before the long trip. I had: Vietnamese noodles, banana crepe, cereal, toast with butter and jam, fruit, iced coffee and fruit juice. Greedy I know but the staff did not hesitate. On that note the restaurant staff were fantastic.

The room was big, bright and comfortable and it was definitely enjoyable to relax in.

This place is excellent value for money.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed here for 2 nights and had a wonderful experience. The staff, especially Emily and Mary, were thoughtful, friendly, informative, and helpful. They made our honeymoon so enjoyable. The rooms were great, spacious and clean. Since it is located down an alley, the room was quiet both in the morning and night. The restaurant was lovely and had great breakfasts.

Overall, a wonderful experience! Keep up the good work Emily and Mary!
h_title_comment: Excellent staff, beautiful rooms, great location
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I did not stay at this hotel, however all i did was eat at the hotel restaurant because it was rated quite highly and i was in the vicinity. I had just spent a whole day exploring Hue after coming down from Hanoi via overnight train and i had not had proper rest or a shower in 2 days. After exploring Hue in a killer weather (it was extremely hot when i went), i was sweaty and smelly and exhausted so i just wanted to find a nice, relaxing, cooling dinner place to sit down and have a simple meal. I went into Serene hotel's restaurant for a meal and after i ate there i noticed that they had showering facilities in their shared bathroom in the lobby. i took a chance and asked the restaurant and hotel staff if my friend and i could use their showering facilities because we haven't had a shower in 2 days and they were extremely gracious at not only letting us use the shower but loaning us towels as well! After the shower, while waiting for my friend to be done showering, i fell asleep in the lobby. My friend joined me shortly after. Not only did they allow us to rest there for almost 2 hours, they even offered us a hot cup of tea/coffee and a bag of fruits when we woke up. Amazing service! Thank you so much for what you've done, you made my trip to Hue the best trip i've had so far by your simple yet extremely important and meaningful gesture. Thank you!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
From the moment i booked staff were very helpful sorting out transfers etc.
The restaurant served the best food i had while in vietnam (and i ate a lot of great food while traveling there).
The room was large clean and comfortable with a great shower.
I only wished i could stay longer.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: We stayed for 3 nights. Our request to be side by side was accommodated. The staff at the front desk and at the restaurant are friendly but professional. All speak excellent English. They assisted us with bookings, tours and restaurant recommendations. The hotel is quiet and the rooms are spacious and well maintained and modern. The hotel is located in a lane way and just around corner from many restaurants. It is about a 25 minute walk to the citadel. I would highly recommend this hotel.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: From beginning to end, the whole experience was fantastic. The staff are friendly and welcoming, the bed is huge and very comfortable, the bathroom is a good size and very modern. The restaurant is very good and their suggested restaurants also impressed. Would certainly stay here again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Lovely hotel with a great restaurant in the lobby. Go for the Hue banquet the best salad I have tasted so far. Very helpful staff, clean and comfortable. Hue is a great town unfortunately we only had one short night there it is now on our list as somewhere to go back to, spend a few nights to have a look around.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: I have been to Vietnam about 6 times and stayed in about 7 major city areas. I usually stay at Intercontinental or other high-end hotels. Well, in Hue I decided to try this hotel -- yes, it is quite small and not expensive. I loved it soooo much! I wish I could find a hotel like this everywhere I travel. It is on a side street, but walking distance from everything. It is in a nice quiet area and the name 'Serene' is very fitting! The breakfast is fabulous and I had several other meals at the restaurant and loved them! Staff are very good and they can speak good English making it easy to communicate. They arranged transport for me, etc. My room was spacious and the air conditioning worked well and the bed was very comfortable and wonderful shower!!! I highly recommend this hotel
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled on business

h_content_comment: A very cheap and friendly hotel in an odd location (at the end of a lane - looks dodgy but isn't!), but the room we had was really mediocre. It smelled of smoke and the bathroom smelled of urine! It was very basic and plain. The restaurant serves great food though!
h_title_comment: Very mediocre hotel but lovely staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The customer service was the best I have ever encountered, in any hotel in the world. From the initial contact with the hotel by e-mail, to the moment we were dropped at our next hotel in Hoi an, every member of staff we encountered were welcoming, attentive, kind and helpful. Breakfasts were good, and we ate the best dinners of the holiday in the restaurant. The hotel was fantastic value for money. The room was immaculately clean and the beds were very comfortable. It was the least expensive of the hotels we booked, but because of the personal attention of the staff, it was our favorite.
h_title_comment: Outstanding customer service and wonderful food.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
I was a little worried when the taxi turned down the alley, but this hotel is wonderful.
Because it's down an alley, it's nice and quiet. The rooms were very clean. The staff couldn't be friendlier or more helpful.
h_title_comment: Clean rooms, warm, helpful staff, great value
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: This is a nice, quiet hotel a few blocks from the center of hue. The staff were excellent, service was very good, the room was clean, and well apportioned. A generous portion of fruit on arrival was a nice touch.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Another Hotel recommended the serene palace hotel. We stayed there for two nights to visit the historical sites. It was lovely. The staff was very helpful and their driver was very friendly. The room was very very clean, but may be a little bit out dated. We had requested a high floor, and we became it: that was really wonderful.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Serene Hotel â€“ Hue

I thought our last hotel was superb (Royal River in Hoi An), but the Serene Palace in Hue is almost as good at only half the price (US$26). I believe that if you book direct you can get it even cheaper. I booked the Serene Hotel in Hanoi through the desk here and they gave me a small discount to the internet price plus free pick-up.

I don't need to dwell on the service here as every other review has done, except to say they take a personal interest in every guest, and the service is second to non.

Apart from the service, the restaurant is the prize asset. You can get a six course fixed menu dinner for two for 259,000 vnd, and it's an amazing meal. Other dishes available average around 60,000. Breakfast is a-la cart, eggs to order or just about anything else you fancy. Just ask Ami.

We stayed for four days. On arrival we were upgraded to a deluxe room with a bath. We arrived around 8.30am and were able to check in immediately. We take the evening train to Hanoi, and arranged checkout for 8pm.

The rooms are a decent size and come with a small desk complete with desktop computer, table and 2 chairs, wardrobe, luggage rack, two bedside tables with draws, robes, heaps of bathroom product, fresh fruit bowl every morningâ€¦ basically everything you have come to expect from a hotel twice the price. Wifi is super fast

The location is good, with several cafes in the lane and plenty more around the corner.

I have no hesitation in giving this hotel five starsâ€¦ I'd give them six if I could.
h_title_comment: Just stay here, you won't regret
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Was celebrating an anniversary. Please see photo attached! Thank you to the staff who arranged this lovely surprise for us both! Definitely had the wow factor!! The room was absolutely stunning and worthy of a five star rating!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Without a doubt the best hotel we stayed in in Vietnam! The rooms were very impressive and spotless and the staff were very attentive. We arrived before our check in time and the staff managed to get our room available early. Whilst we waited we were greeted with complimentary fruit, juice and cold towels.

Every morning, the staff come over to see how you are and to give you help with your plans for the day. We checked out quite early in the morning and only had a small breakfast and before we could leave a member of staff ran over with a bag of fruit for us to keep us going.

I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants a comfortable stay in Hue in a very nice hotel.
h_title_comment: Best hotel we have stayed in!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The staff are definitely what makes this a top choice in Hue. I cannot give 5 stars because it is not '5 star material'. For this you need to have a pool, more facilities, better toiletries etc (and NOT ask to give a 5 star review on tripadvisor!!). The breakfast is adequate, the dinner was nice but the restaurant does not have any ambience. That said, it is still good value for money if you need a reasonable room in the centre of Hue.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: What a great place to stay. Very neat and tidy accommodation with all neat and modern amenities. Staff are the best. Sally brilliant, happy Peanut sensational person, emily great thanks all at serene. I will be back geoff, fitzy and families
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
The best hotel we have ever stayed at. The personal touch you feel every single minute of your stay makes you dream of coming back again and again or better never leaving at all:) Exclusively helpful and friendly staff, wonderful breakfast and meals at the restaurant, clean and comfortable rooms make your stay unforgettable. We definitely recommend Serene Palace hotel. It's unbelievable value for money!
Armandas with family
Lithuania
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: The staff went out of their way to make sure that we had a perfect stay in hue city. They were very helpful at recommending things to see and do. We really enjoyed our time at the Serene Palace Hotel. The breakfasts were free and very well done.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We stayed here for one night and had dinner in the restaurant which the food was great. We were greeted with fresh fruit, drink and cold towel on arrival which was appreciated after a hot day in Hue. Our room was clean and the breakfast which is included was everything we needed.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
We only stayed in the hotel for one night which wasn't really long enough to explore Hue properly. The hotel is lovely. We were greeted with complimentary juice and food. The room was big and really nice. Was well airconditioned which is definitely needed in Hue in June! We ate at the restaurant which was nice and breakfast was good too.

Staff were really helpful booking excursions for us and the airport transfer was good.

Would definitely recommend staying here!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We can only say good things about this hotel, on our short stay in Hue we checked in late, had dinner in the hotel, something we would not normally do, food was great service excellent. Our room with 2 double beds without fault, clean and fresh. Breakfast excellent and included in room price. They want good ratings on tripadvisor and are doing everything they can ro make your stay the best possible A+ for price paid.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
The rooms are nice and modern, great value for money. Also the most comfiest bed we slept on during our whole trip! A/C worked wonderfully!
Location is close to shops and restaurants.
The Staff were wonderful and happy to help and point our popular attractions and arrange transport to our next destination.
Really recommend to anyone heading to Hue!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The Hue serene Palace Hotel is located down a narrow side street - and we did wonder if we had booked the right place! When we arrived we were greeted with cold drinks, fruit and informative staff. This hotel is extremely clean and modern (when we went exploring we found they are currently doing up rooms upstairs- painting, redecorating) The beds were comfortable and we got a good sleep. We did not notice any noise from any other rooms - even though there did seem to be someone checking in every time we were in the foyer. The hotel itself is a short walk from the river and restaurants, yet remains quiet and a peaceful place to return at the end of the day. The staff spoke good English, and were very helpful with directions and advice. We hired scooters from the hotel and they were available within 30 mins. They even packed a breakfast parcel for us - when we checked out before breakfast to go on an outing. We ate a the restaurant once while we were there and found the staff attentive and the food excellent. WE would definitely stay here again. Thanks Emily
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
I really wished I could have stayed more than one night in this hotel. It is in a great location not far from many interesting eating places, night market etc. I heard from people that their dinner was also good, but I was too tired to try any dinner when I arrived. The breakfast however was great! You had many choices.

The hotel lobby was beautiful and so was the room. They welcome you with a drink and a dish of delicious fruits. There is also free fruit in the room.The room had everyting you wanted and even a scale in case you worry about eating too much delicious food in Vietnam. The bed was very comfortable, room was spacious and tastefully decorated. Room had all the amenities.

The staff members were great; very friendly and efficient.

What else should I look for in a hotel?

I highly recommend this hotel to anyone and suggest staying more than one night.
h_title_comment: One of the best in Vietnam!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: Upon arrival we were greeted with fresh fruit and a fresh watermelon smoothie, whilst our room was being prepared. The room was spacious, coherent and had a PC to access to the internet. The shower worked a dream and both hot and cold water was available. Breakfast was very good, fresh pancakes and poached eggs were prepared and the waitresses were very attentive. Don't be put off by the street the hotel is on as it's a gem and the best we have stayed in on our tour.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We had a wonderful 3 nights in Hue Serene Palace Hotel!
Staff are great, so helpful and friendly!!
Rooms are spotless and spacious! Couldnt ask for more!

No need to venture anywhere for dinner, the in house restaurant is amazing, food is delicious!!

Def worth a visit!! :)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
A great new modern hotel, with a central location. The rooms are beautifully laid out and quite. The hotel is in easy walking distance to the main tourist area, Perfume River and night markets etc. The staff are so beautiful and friendly which adds to the stay here. The breakfast is yummy each morning and we ate dinner in the Restaurant every night, as it was simply delicious and very well priced.

Once you stay here you can certainly see why this hotel is number one on Tripadvisor. Working as a manger in the travel and Tourism industry in Australia, I can be quite judgmental on accommodation standards and service. I could not pick one fault with this hotel. Well done Serene Palace, stand proud of yourselves for all the hard work you all do to maintain your ratings with ease. I highly recommend this hotel if you stay in Hue, if you donâ€™t, you will miss out on one of the best attraction in Hue!! You all rock!!
h_title_comment: No wonder these guys are number #1 on Tripadvisor.....WOW!!!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Best Hotel we stayed at during our trip through Vietnam. Staff was very attentive, friendly and not intrusive as we have experienced at other place throughout Vietnam. The room was great, clean, well furnished and equipped. The inhouse Restaurant is also a gem and the dinner set menu special should not be missed! Breakfast was above average as well!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Super friendly and helpful staffs, strategic locations - restaurants and bars are reachable on foot. Clean and comfort room. Clean bathroom. Breakfast is just average (they need to improve their skills on cooking eggs though). But overall, this hotel is nice, comfortable and of course value for money!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
Lovely hotel in central location!

We stayed here for 3 nights and really enjoyed our time here !

Rooms are very luxurious and comfortable, at least of 3 star quality for and extremely fair price.

Staff could not have done more for us, they were so helpful and lovely from first arrival to organising our motorbike trip to Hoi an! Travel desk will help you organise anything and have very good knowledge and suggestions for your time in Hue.

Would highly recommend this hotel!

Thank you
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
From the moment we walked into Serene Palace the staff bent over backwards to accommodate us.
We arrange a transfer from the airport and was very surprised to have an English speaking driver. Later we learnt he was the owner son, and what a great ambassador for his father. He had us laughing and joking about driving ways of both Australia and Vietnan.
The hotel room did not let us down. It was stunning. The views from the restaurant was stunning. View from our room wasnt the best, but with so much to see in Hue who spends much time in there.
If I had to find a fault the out side smoking area on the 7th floor could do with some shade and weather protection but hey thats such a minor thing for such a great hotel.
We will not hesitate in staying here again
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: This hotel does not disappoint. When you first drive up the alley way, you may freak - BUT DONT!! This hotel and staff are super. We arrived off the overnight train from Hanoi with a 3 and 6 year old. Greeted with a plate of fresh fruit and juice and friendly staff who found us a room for early check in. Our room was great - big enough for my husband and I to do a small work out! The staff help us organize all our tours at a good rate. We were in walking distance to everything. They also organized our private driver to Da Nang with many stop offs along the way for 70 bucks US for hotel to hotel. Go to this hotel! It's fantastic!!!!And the restaurant is sooooooo good we ate here 3 nights in a row!!!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
We stayed in Hue in April, when it was very hot outside but the Serene Palace Hotel was like an oasis, with friendly staff to welcome you every time you came in the door.
The attentive staff at breakfast made sure you were never hungry and the food was wonderful, all sorts of eggs, fruit and Vietnamese dishes as well. We also had dinner in the restaurant one night which was fantastic, especially their salads. Sally, Sabrina, Ivy, Sami and Amy were so attentive and even managed to get a couple of recipes from the chef and wrote them out for us.
The location of the hotel is excellent, it's in a quite back street but close to everything - we had a room with a balcony overlooking the city which was great.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
This hotel was fantastic, the room sizes were spacious and had really good views of Hue. Its location was really good and down a back street so it was nice and quite. You can pretty much organize anything from the front desk and its at a really good price too. We hired motorbikes and you had access to the for the whole day and night. The staff were super helpful in explaining how to get around to major attractions and also in telling us how much parking and things like that should cost so we didn't get over charged.
The staff we so wonderful in particular Tina from the front desk, she made us feel really welcome and was really helpful. Though so are all of their staff.
This is a really great hotel and for us exceed our expectations in every way!
h_title_comment: Best 3 star hotel should be 4 star!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: A superb hotel, very elegant, comfortable with great service and delicious food. Everyone was very friendly and warm. Close to all the action and sights. Hope to go back one day. Hue is a lovely place
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
amazing breakfast
staff was wonderful helpful for the tours and for booking hotels and bus
room very big and clean
great value for money
we got free bicycles to visit the toown
the best hotel we had in Vietnam
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Very nice hotel, 10min walking from the Citadel. We were offered a welcome drink just when we came in. Also, we were given advices for our stay in Hue (what to visit, where to eat, etc). The room was nice and comfortable for a very affordable price. And we had dinner and breakfast in their restaurant, and in both meals the food was excellent.
The only BUT that I could say is that the hotel is in a very narrow street and the hotels around that street don't know how to find this hotel. Taxis know about it though. So if you are walking outside the hotel, have a good look of where you have to turn left or right so you can come back with no problem.
Apart from that, I really recommend this hotel :)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This hotel deserves every bit of credit I can give. It's like they are giving it away!

The Serene Palace experience begins when you enter. (Don't let the street it's in fool you by the way). The door is always being held open for you. When you enter and when you leave. We got a fresh juice and a plate of fruit when we arrived and our bags were carried to our rooms.

The rooms are amazing! We got a huge soft bed! Good flatscreen with all moviechannels. Good working AC. Some free water, tea, coffee and fruit. And there was even a computer with internet in our room!

The bathroom was also quite big with a huge shower and loads of shampoos and stuff to choose from.

Goes without saying that everything was nice and clean!

Staff was very helpfull and spoke the best english (so far) of all hotels and hostels we've been. They will get you on your way in HuÃ©. Even when we were just chilling in the lobby we got some free icetea.

Really amazing guys! Keep it up!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Great value for money. Staff so friendly & helpful, having a laptop provided in the room was an added bonus. Very helpful with tourist attractions & not pushy. Used the laundry service, clothes came back smelling so fresh! Breakfast was very good- great selection- could order as much as you wanted off the menu- staff encouraged this too!!Can't rate this hotel high enough- best hotel we stayed in .
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
I stayed here with my sister on the last night of a week-long stint in Vietnam. It was great! The "Twin-share" room was actually 2 double beds, and we had a fridge, kettle, coffee & tea provided, safety deposit box, tv with cable, and a computer (never seen that before in a hotel room!). The room was clean and comfortable, and the shower was great. Breakfast was included, and we could order whatever we wanted from the menu (both Vietnamese and western food) and they'd bring it out for us - eat as much as you like.

When we first got there we were a little confused about how to get to the hotel, as it was down an alleyway, but it was so close to everything! After we had checked in (they gave us cool towels and a drink of fresh passion fruit juice while we waited), they provided us with a map of Hue and circled the attractions we wanted to see. They also offered a trip to see the Pagoda and Ancient Citadel with a free taxi to the boats and private boat trip up and down the river for $20 USD total - and our driver came to pick us up just 15 minutes later! It was a great service. They also helped us to book a private car from Hue to Lang Co beach and then Ba Na hills, before heading to the airport in Da Nang. The driver was a bit pricey ($67 USD), but he gave us time to stop and take photos whenever we wanted, and played some cool music in his car. He also watched our bags while we were at Ba Na, and drove very well. We didn't mind too much, because in total we spent $32 AUD for the night for the "twin-share" room (breakfast included). Bargain!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Hotel located in a quiet area, very good treatment received; all the staff is very polite and helpful.
Room well clean and bright, breakfast can improve but still acceptable. Possibility to hire scooters or car; I would also recommend in relation to the quality/price, really good!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
This is a really clean hotel. I mean really clean!
The staff are excellent Location is good. There is a Karoke bar next door but our room was at the back of the hotel on the 7th floor. It was very quiet.
The bar doesn't seem to make much noise anyway.
Our bed was very very comfy and huge.
The hotels restaurant is #1 on TA. So very easy if you want to eat at the hotel. They have a buy one, get one free mojito cocktail special all night and guests of the hotel get 10% off the bill. These deals make for an extremely cheap meal.
The hotel is in a good location. Come out of the front entrance and turn left and there are some lovely little cafes. If you turn right you are heading in the direction of the river. It's lovely to walk along the river in the evening towards the night market that starts at 7pm. The staff are very helpful with hints and directions.
We paid US$50 to have a full day private tour in a hotel car. I don't think this was really the best way to see Hue. We had to purchase our own combination ticket. (VND 280 each) this included 2 tombs and the citadel. There are two types of combination tickets. One has an extra temple. Honestly three temples is plenty. The problem with the hotel tour is that the driver has very little English so really gives no information to you at all. We had no idea what we were driving past or where we were driving to. Apparently you can pay more for a guide (US$30). It's all a bit expensive. I think you could find a driver who spoke English yourself and get a better tour.
This is an excellent hotel. I would stay here again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Excellent value for money! (I went on low season and paid almost 22usd for standard double room) excellent breakfast and staff. Room super spacious and comfortable! Definitely I recommend staying here!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This is a good place to stay. The new hotel with wonderful room,beautiful furniture,good service and low price. I really like this hotel and enjoyed most of time with my family when we stay here.don't forget the breakfast,just one word to say:"delicous".
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment:
Booked this hotel after reading reviews from TA. Did not let us down at all! Located in a relatively quiet alleyway, with a karaoke place beside it; despite that it was never noisy and I felt safe walking home at night. Got a nice spacious twin room that was clean and bright with comfy bed and good air conditioning in the hot summer weather. Beautiful room. Water pressure was also good (some budget hotels have really weak water pressure) which made baths so much more enjoyable amidst the summer heat. Breakfast was simple yet delicious with a good mix of food choices, juices and local fruits. Staff were friendly and accommodating to my request of a cup of hot water for my daily dosage of wolfberries tea with a smile.

However, it would be much better if reception staff could provide more detailed information on the nearby amenities apart from those of the tours.

Overall, i would recommend this hotel for those looking for a clean, comfortable and welcoming place that is in the range of usd30/night.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
I've been travelling in Hue last December (2014) with my husband. I can recommend this hotel for the price and the lovely staff. The room was little, clean and I can say good for the price.
The place is quite central in a narrow and dark street.
The breakfast could be better, not a lot of choice, often without bread or juice, not a very clean buffet. If you stay for the dinner I can say that the place is very simple but the food was a very good traditional Vietnamese cuisine.
If you are planning to visit the place around the staff arranged for us a very good driver and nice excursions.
h_title_comment: Good price, quite nice room, lovely staff
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
Great value, 3 stars hotel but look like 4 stars hotel located in a small quite ally in a the tourists area.
Nice rooms, good Wi Fi and the staff are very useful and the breakfast is very good.
Also in the hotel one of the best restaurant in Hue.
Worth every song.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: What a great little hotel. Greeted with a bowl of fruit and glass of fresh juice on arrival. Super-friendly and helpful reception staff. Nothing too much trouble for them. Rooms are a high standard. Plus the restaurant is one of the best in town. Ate one evening meal here - very nice local specialities. The waiting staff went round the tables chatting to people about their trip (could be annoying, but was actually felt really nice and genuine). Breakfast choice is extensive, with a menu including cooked breakfast as well as local choices. All round excellent value, plus a good location very close to backpacker area but on a quiet street. Would definitely go back there.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
This hotel is just incredible value for money!!!! We paid for a 3 star and got a 4 star plus!!! Everything here was a delight, from the welcoming drinks and fruits, to our standard room which not only was super ample and with a tasteful decoration, but every single detail in the room had maintainance over it, impecable, smelt heavenly and even a full on computer was available in our room for personal use. We wished we had more nights in Vietnam so that we could have staying longer here.
If you wanted more, the food was the best we had in Vietnam (and we obviously weren't expecting that) and the staff are just the most genuinely courteous of all!!! Don't think it twice :)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We stayed here last month for 3 days during our travels in vietnam and found the staff and hotel brilliant!
The staff were happy to show us places to visit in Hue and a map and book taxis for us to get to the citadel. There's a few restaurants on the little road the hotel is on, but far more choice if you walk 10mins towards the centre. We ate in the hotel one night and had good food, the restaurant staff were friendly and attentive. Breakfast involved choosing food off the menu and ordering with also toast and fruit to choose from.
Overall we had a great stay and would come back if we ever go to Hue again.
h_title_comment: Brilliant hotel down a quiet little road
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We booked this hotel on the internet and got a bit of a fright when we were dropped off by the taxi at the entrance of an alley way. The hotel was a couple of meters walk away and stunning. It is in an excellent location. Service is outstanding. Great help in booking a motorbike tour to Hoi an. Rooms are very spacious and modern, bathrooms are big. All rooms have desktop computers with free internet. Breakfast is nice.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Best hotel during our 2 weeks trip in Vietnam. Stuff and service was just amazing. Very reasonable price for room and tours. Real value for money. Good location, in walking distance from citadele. Oveall we very liked it.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: the hotel was excellent especially the staff... the bfast was good.. the staff was good in recommending where to go , what to do, what to eat..we were introduced somewhere where few foreigners go eg eating "clam rice" which we did and also visit a bar Cafe Non on a little island on the river..
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Good hotel. Stayed here for 2 nights from 5 June. Located down a lane but close to everything. Staff were lovely and always ready to help with anything. If there's such a thing as 'over service' then these guys know how to do it. Can be a little stifling at times but they mean well. Room was a good size with a western facing balcony which is great for sunset viewing. Walk in shower and good size bathroom. Good value for money hotel with friendly staff.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
The staff at Hue Serene Palace were really great. I arrived in Hue extremely ill and the hotel staff member who came to fetch us from the train station practically carried me to the taxi. He took me to hospital and spoke to the doctors before taking my husband to Serene Palace. The staff at the hotel were extremely caring and helpful throughout our stay.
We liked the location of the hotel and our room was comfortable, quiet and clean. We had a few meals at the hotel restaurant and the food was excellent.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: My husband and I stayed for 2 nights - it was the cleanest room I think we have ever stayed in, the photos on the website are exactly as it is, reception staff were so helpful and the breakfast buffet was simple but you could eat as much as you liked served by super friendly fun staff. Highly recommend - such wonderful value for money
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I stay here just 1 night only and I enjoy that. the staff is so friendly, the breakfast is so good. the location is in small street so it is really quite in the evening. But for some reason, TV were turned on automatically 2 times in the early morning (2am & 3am). I think some one set up the time for TV. But it makes me scare a little bit. but any way, I will be back
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
As per most hotels in Vietnam, the value of this hotel is exceptional. Helped arrange scooters and onward transportation, and also spent a lot of time talking us through the town.

The room was very large and clean (just a standard room) with everything you would expect - working safe, minibar etc. Restaurant area feels a bit like sitting in the hotel lobby, but the food makes up for that - perfect for a day exploring the ancient sites.

Not the easiest to find as it is down a small side road, with little signage from the main roads.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Check in was a very relaxing experience, they welcomed us with drinks and fruits whilst they checked us in and the porter took the bags to the room and turned on the air conditioning. The staff were all very friendly, Julia in particular was extremely helpful in helping us organise our full day in Hue to take a boat along the river and visit the Pagodas and tombs outside the centre of the City. We were in a room on the 7th floor which was very quiet. It is a short walk from some excellent local restaurants.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: We only stayed for one night but we wished we stayed longer. Out room was great! TV, mini bar, bed was huge (and very comfortable), really nice and clean bathroom and there was even a computer to use with free wifi. Such friendly staff who speak English very well. Always interested in your plans and travels so far. Bit hard to find as it's located down a laneway but its conveniently located right in the centre of town. If/when we come back to Vietnam, we WILL be coming back here!
h_title_comment: Fantastic hotel! How is it only 3 star!?
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The Serene Palace Hotel is off the main drag, which is one of its attractions. It's in the main tourist area, but on an alley rather than a street. This makes it part of the real town instead of just another tourist joint. The ladies who run the hotel are notably accomplished; they all speak excellent English. It's unfair to single out anyone, but Si was especially helpful, making arrangements for later on in our trip. The room/bathroom were excellent and the restaurant was superb. Breakfast was delicious and plentiful. We were sad to leave. I thoroughly recommend the hotel.
h_title_comment: Excellent hotel, outstanding standard of spoken English and helpful team
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
It was the BEST boutique hotel I've stayed in Asia. The hotel's staff was outstanding - in fact I think they all qualify to work for five star hotels.

During my 3 days stay at Serene palace, I experienced rip offs from outside vendor, a pick up cancelled by my next hotel, an upset stomach - a lot of hiccups that weren't caused by the hotel. However its warm, friendly and caring staff always brightened my days. From the receptionists, to the restaurant staff, to everyone I encountered here, they would go up and beyond for you on even the smallest details.

THANK YOU SERENE PALACE IN HUE!
h_title_comment: BEST SERVICE EVER (for a boutique hotel)
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: This hotel does exactly as it says on the tin! It has a very calm atmosphere about the place, is clean, not overly expensive and the food and breakfast are very good! The reception are very professional and the catering staff very personable, stay here you won't regret it!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Had a really brief stay here, the staff were lovely people. Rooms clean and pristine. Really comfortable beds, higher class feel with half the price. Would definitely recommend and stay here again. Offers breakfast in the morning but didn't eat, although the food did look good!
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: We stayed here for two nights in May '15 and we were sorry it wasn't longer. From the welcoming glass of fruit juice and plate of fresh fruit when we arrived until the good bye the morning of our departure we felt like family. Lovely staff, friendly and helpful. Will stay here again.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: As the driver for the pick up had a problem and was not at the airport, I took a cab to the hotel. Without asking, they immediately refund me the money for the taxi. Top! The room was very nice, big and super clean. You also get every day some fruit.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Email correspondence with the hotel before arriving was answered promptly by Jenny.

We arranged with the hotel to pick us up from the train station and a staff Brian was waiting for us when we arrived. He flagged a taxi for us to bring us to the hotel. The cost was 4 USD which is more expensive than we getting a taxi on our own but we didn't mind as this saved us the trouble to haggle with taxi driver in an unfamiliar location.

Upon arrival at the hotel we were given cold towels and fruits while we got our hotel room sorted out. We were given a room with a balcony on the 6th floor which we could watch sunset during our stay.

We also asked the hotel to arrange a private boat ride on the perfume river for the two of us costing 15 USD as well as a bus ride back to Hoi An for 5 USD each.

All the staff were genuinely friendly and helpful and the restaurant served excellent food so we didn't dine anywhere other than at the hotel restaurant.

The room and toilet were very clean but the bed a little soft which affected our sleep because when one of us moved, the other would feel the movement of the bed as well.

There was also a personal computer in the room which we didn't use. Fruits were provided everyday during our stay.

Location wise, the hotel is on a quiet back lane but within walking distance to most of the attractions. The night market is 10 minutes walk along the river.

We did enjoy our stay at The Serene Palace hotel and were very pleased with the excellent service of all the hotel staff.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This has been far the most luxury hotel we have stayed in during our trip in Vietnam, and that for a very good price! The staff was really welcoming when we arrived, and we got a re freshening welcome drink and fruit upon arrival. The room was super clean with a nice bed and really spacious. The staff were all really assisting and friendly and fun to be around with. They booked a motor tour for us that was really rewarding. The hotel is in a smaller street off sight, but is in walking distance if everything important. Definitely a good place to stay and well worth the price!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
My fiancÃ© and I have just recently spent 1 night at Serene Palace. We were in a city view double room on the top 7th floor.

The hotel is set just back from the main strip in a small side street. This certainly helped with street noise. I would recommend, though, to get a room higher up to avoid any possible noise from the karaoke club next door or the online gaming joint across the road. We certainly heard nothing from either.

The whole hotel looked very recently renovated/new. Our room was very clean and nicely decorated with a high ceiling. The king sized bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was fitted out with modern appliances.

However, most outstanding was the friendliness and efficiency of the staff, both front of house and wait staff. We shared many laughs as I tried out my basic Vietnamese! They also organised a car transfer to Hoi An for $65. This was great value as our fantastic driver, Huy, was happy to stop anywhere we wished. So what we thought was going to be a basic trip to Hoi An, ended up with stopping at a local fishing village; going for a swim in the ocean at Lang Co beach; having an amazing seafood lunch at a local overwater restaurant (our cost) and having the best Vietnamese iced coffee and view at the top of Hai Van Pass.

Thank you to the staff of Serene Palace for making our short stay so memorable.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: My welcome to this hotel was excellent, with a welcome drink and fruit plate on arrival. The room was lovely and big with a TV, computer and mini bar, in addition to the included water and fruit. Breakfast was great and staff very helpful. I only stayed one night, wish it could have been longer.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
Very comfortable and great value for money. Arrived at the hotel and was given free welcome smoothie and fruit plate. Room was spotlessly clean and looked newly renovated. All staff are friendly and accommodating; they greet you with genuine smiles, not fake pleasantries like other hotels.

I stayed for four nights and was greeted by name by all staff throughout the stay. They really go the extra mile to make you feel welcome.

The breakfast was very good. Only qualm is that the fruit with breakfast looked a little past it's prime.

Thanks, Serene Palace.
h_title_comment: Great value for money and excellent service
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: The food was incredible, the bathroom was impeccable and the staff are the friendliest and most helpful people I've ever met. Staying at the Serene made my trip in Vietnam. It was an absolute pleasure! I would definitely recommend this pace in a heartbeat! So glad we found this gem. Missing this beautiful hotel already! Thank you Serene for making my Vietnam trip complete!
h_title_comment: One of the best hotels I've ever been to!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: I didn't stay at this hotel but I ate here a couple times during my stay in Hue, the food is delicious and the staff are very friendly and helpful! The cashew nut chicken was the best thing I've eaten yet in Vietnam! It was very good value for the quality of the food!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment: The hotel is loacted in a very small and quiet alley right next to the tourist area in Hue. It features nice and large rooms - even though we picked the cheapest category. The service is just WOW!!! Outstanding!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel has it all. Very helpful professional staff. Very clean and spacious rooms. Great restaurant with a chef that will accommodate your food requirement and produces delicious food. Well situated in Hue. Not far from the citadel. All this excellent services for the price of 30$ /room/night---highly recommended
h_title_comment: One of the best value for money hotel in Vietnam
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The hotel was really good, the staff was really great, the food in the restaurant was amazing and the room was very comfortable. And also the price is really attractive. It's not a fancy hotel but it's not a problem at all! We love it and we will definitely recommend it to our friends.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: Hue Serene Palace hotel has nice, clean rooms. The frontdesk staff is very helpful and friendly. Location is fine, just a little walk from all the restaurants etc. Breakfast and diner in the hotelrestaurant was good too. Absolutely worth the money.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel was absolutely fabulous! It was a great location, within walking distance of the Citadel and the local market. The staff at the front desk is awesome (they arranged bicycles for us along with transport from the airport and a car to take us to Hoi An and even packed up some breakfast for us when we asked) and the fruit they left in the room was a really nice touch. The restaurant was also great, we highly recommend it.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: you drive down this very narrow one way street then come upon this modern lovely hotel. Spacious clean rooms with friendly staff. I doubt you would find more friendly and accommodation restaurant staff anywhere. The Hotel apart from narrow street is in an excellent location very close to shopping and excellent restaurants.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with family

h_content_comment: Hotel was clean, room large, beds fine, but was in seedy part of town and hotel had very little in way of personality. Unlike other reviews i didn't find staff overly amazing, nice enough but mostly looked bored and going through the motions. Breakfast was pretty average. I wouldn't stay again.
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment: We were very impressed with the level of service and friendliness of staff at Serene Palace Hotel. The location was fabulous and it was easy to walk around the city and even to the Citadel if you wanted to. Breakfast was included and each day we were encouraged to eat more! We also dined at the restaurant for dinner a couple of times - price and service were great. I highly recommend you stay here, we stayed a week and loved it - we were very comfortable. The room was spacious and the bathroom very good.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: This hotel was wonderfully clean and tidy: rooms were more than adequate and breakfast meals a joy to have with very attentive staff. Staff very knowledgeable about Hue and were very efficient at arranging tours etc. Stayed for two nights only but would stay longer next time around.
h_title_comment: Staff were wonderfully co-operative and friendly. Very welcoming when we arrived
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We got to the hotel later in the day and I wanted to see the Buddhist Temples that day and then leave to go to Hoi An the next day. One of the staff members helped me arrange the whole thing right when I got there. She set up a private car for me to go to Hoi An so that my husband and I could make stops along the way (to see Marble Mountain and China Beach). She was so helpful and the hotel was so nice. We will definitely go back when we return.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
My girlfriend and I stayed at this hotel in May, we arrive around 9pm and we were greeted with a plate a fruit and welcoming drink (both delicious).

Restaurant: We are here multiple times and their prices are very fair and relatively cheap, what surprised me the most was they gave us 10% discounts on meals which was very nice and unexpected.

Breakfast: The breakfast is the best! In my 4 nights here I probably ate 4 mangos just at breakfast the fruit selection is amazing! The breakfast menu is fairly large and you can order how much you want, and when your full you still get offered to order more :)

Room: Room was very clean and we no problems at all, I'd admit I had a 10 minute shower and the hot water showed no signs of running out. I found it had awesome WIFI being able to load youtube and blog.

Staff: The staff are the absolute best part of the hotel, the best hospitality I have ever experienced. Very friendly and speak good English, I never once felt like I was being sold to It felt like we were the king and queen of the palace.

Overall we got way more than what we paid for, I ate my moneys worth just at breakfast.
I highly recommend this place to anyone who is considering staying at HUE.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: My boyfriend and I absolutely loved our stay at this hotel. We were welcomed with a fresh juice and a fruit platter then taken to our room that had been upgraded for free! The room was clean and very spacious. Breakfast was amazing and so was the food off the lunch/dinner menu. The real highlight was definitely the brilliant staff who always went out of their ways to ensure we were having an excellent stay. Thanks Julia and the rest of the team! We certainly hope to be back.
h_title_comment: Totally exceeded our expectations - the best hotel!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Excellent staff and very helpful, the food was great and the facilities were of a high standard.The location is central to night life and Restaurants and relaxed neighbourhood to walk around. The river walk is close by.
h_title_comment: This hotel was excellent in every respect.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I chose this hotel almost at random, but I'm glad I did. The room was large, clean, and had excellent amenities. The breakfast was included, and also very good. The best part was the staff though, who really go above and beyond to make sure you are enjoying your stay. They are incredibly helpful and friendly. I would definitely recommend this to someone who wants somewhere comfortable to stay.
h_title_comment: Great hotel at a decent price
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
A lovely hotel with a wonderful and helpful staff ! Everything was perfect from the booking to the check out!
Immediatly after the booking, the staff contact us by email and help us to plan our travel in Hue, giving us a lot of relevant advice and answering really quickly to our requests.
At our arrival, we discovered in a small and quiet street this very nice hotel and were welcomed with a small drink. Rooms were large, modern and very clean, including a computer at the disposal of guests and comfy beds. The staff provide us a city map, giving us a lot of advice about places to discover in Hue and all around.
The Breakfast was very good, with many different choices, including Vietnamese specialities of course!
Our journey in Hue City was perfect and we strongly recommend this hotel!
h_title_comment: The perfect place in Hue City!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: We stayed two days in the hotel and loved every single minute of it. The hotel upgraded our room and therefore our room was really huge, clean, quiet and everything you could wish for. The staff was very helpful and friendy all the time and the breakfast was the best we had in Vietnam. Bikes for rent for $2 per day. If we come to Hue again in the futur we will definitly go for this hotel again.
h_title_comment: Wonderful hotel, wonderful staff, wonderful breakfest
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: I got to know about this hotel from TA reviews. Cleanliness prevails in this hotel is extremely rare in hotels all over the world. If we add to this nice rooms and a great staff it comes out that Hue Serene Palace Hotel is a great hotel. I will try to get back to this hotel in the very near future. Thanks for all...
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment: The hotel was lovely. Rooms were large and clean with a computer screen if we needed to use it. Staff were very friendly and chatty. Liked the map they gave you with useful Vietnamese sentences on the back. Like the position of the hotel - plenty of eateries around it. Only fault I had with the room was that it had a spa bath and no stand up shower. So if you prefer showers like I do, ask for it when booking. Breakfast was a good choice; plenty to eat.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Maybe we were unlucky because there are so many glowing reviews of this hotel, but this was the worst hotel stay during our trip to Vietnam. It is located down a small, quiet backstreet and I felt a little uncomfortable walking back at night. The towels were old and dirty and the bed linen was torn. The internet was extremely slow (even on their PC with LAN connection - if you were lucky enough to get the PC to work!). Worst of all, we kept running out of hot water and the staff would instantly send someone up to "fix it" (despite asking them to wait) while I sat there feeling terribly uncomfortable in a towel!
h_title_comment: Despite all the popular reviews, we WON'T be back!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Really really impressed with this hotel for the cost. Big, modern, clean rooms with super comfy beds. The staff were extremely helpful in booking us a tour last minute and booking us a private car to Denang. The hotel is a short walk to the back packer area, which is really cheap and fun for going out. This was one of my favourite hotels on our trip to Vietnam, book it!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: The Serene Palace is an absolute gem of a hotel in HuÃ©. The rooms are spacious and very clean, with stunning marble bathrooms and beautiful finishes. The staff is extremely gracious and helpful, always available to arrange tours, book transfers, and answer questions about the town. The location is good and within walking distance to the riverfront and several restaurants. I'd definitely recommend the Serene Palace.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled solo

h_content_comment:
The staff are all super nice, friendly and very service minded, they make you feel at home. Our room is spacious, bright with a good size balcony. The bath room is modern and clean. We have tried other hotel in Vietnam that costs 7 times more but with the staff less well trained, less service minded as we experienced at Serene. We had dinner once in the Serene restaurant. Again the service was excellent and the foods were well prepared with reasonable price. The rooms (No. 1 or 2 on each floor) are the best with balcony, worth it with extra cost.
This hotel is highly recommended for anyone visiting Hue, Vietnam!
h_title_comment: Super nice staff, very good value for money
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment: Serene Palace was a beautiful hotel. The service was outstanding! Firstly, we were met with a welcome drink and fruit. The porters carried all 11 of our bags to the rooms for us. The breakfast was amazing. Such a wonderful spread. We had dinner in the restaurant too which was one of the best meals we had in Vietnam. They have us a 10% off coupon too and the menu was varied with reasonable prices. I could not say enough good things about this hotel. Amazing value for money!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
I stayed here for 2 nights before heading to Hoi An. We wish to stay here longer.
I booked the room with balcony directly with them and have a really good price. The room is spacious with comfy bed. The buffet breakfast is huge range of choice and I love the coffee too much.
The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful, They treated us like family member and always smile when we came back from outside. They gave us full information with a good map to discover very nice and peaceful city.
Thanks for your all help.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

h_content_comment:
We've just left this hotel after a fab 3 night stay. Like other reviews have said its down a small side street so could easily be missed. The location is perfect for exploring with everything we wanted to see within walking distance. The rooms are really well appointed and clean. The bed was so comfortable!
All the staff are really friendly and helpful
h_triptype: NA

h_content_comment:
The hotel is located in a narrow street, but close to the city center. Rooms (we had 4 beds) are big and nicely decorated.
We have been welcomed with some fresh fruit and drinks and the hotel staff helped us setting up our tour of the city. The food of the restaurant is really good and extremely cheap so if you're tired after a long trip, go for it.
One of us was sick and the staff gave us a free late check out. I would recommend anyone to stay here!
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
Spent two night's at this wonderful hotel. The room was excellent & quiet. Great location for touring around Hue. Good breakfast.
Transport arranged for us to collect from train and a cool drink and fruit provided when we arrived.
Staff extremely helpful with any needs.
h_triptype: Trip type: Traveled with friends

h_content_comment:
My friend and I only had one night in Hue due to our schedule, but the stay in the Serene Palace Hotel was absolutely great! We could not believe that for this price we could get a room this spacious and beautiful. We were greated by the friendly staff with a welcome juice and fruits, they helped us with transportation and laundry services.
